description:
Genetically modified transhuman warriors, Space Marines are amongst Humanity's most elite fighting forces.
Anges de la Mort kill teams are composed of elite specialists trained in myriad forms of combat, who are capable of overcoming almost any foe.
composition:
An Anges de la Mort KillTeam is composed of:
 
- 1 ANGEL OF DEATH opératif selected from the following list:
  - ASSAULT INTERCESSOR SERGEANT with one option from each of the following:
    - Hand flamer or heavy bolt pistol
    - Chainsword, power fist, power weapon or thunder hammer  
    - Or the following option:
      - Plasma pistol; chainsword
  - INTERCESSOR SERGEANT with one option  from each of the following:
    - Auto bolt rifle, bolt rifle or stalker bolt rifle
    - Chainsword, fists, power fist, power weapon or thunder hammer
  - Marine Spatial CAPTAIN
- 5 ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs selected from the following list:
  - ASSAULT INTERCESSOR GRENADIER
  - ASSAULT INTERCESSOR WARRIOR
  - ELIMINATOR SNIPER*
  - HEAVY INTERCESSOR GUNNER*
  - INTERCESSOR GUNNER with auxiliary grenade launcher and one of the following options:
    - Auto bolt rifle; fists
    - Bolt rifle; fists
    - Stalker bolt rifle; fists    
  - INTERCESSOR WARRIOR with one of the following options:
    - Auto bolt rifle; fists
    - Bolt rifle; fists
    - Stalker bolt rifle; fists

Other than WARRIOR opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.  
*You cannot select more than one of these opératifs combined.

Some ANGEL OF DEATH rules refer to a 'bolt weapon'. This is a ranged weapon that includes 'bolt' in its name, e.g. stalker bolt rifle, heavy bolt pistol, etc.

---

**Chapter Tactics:**  
When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.

opTypes.keywords: ANGEL OF DEATH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, LEADER, SPACE MARINE CAPTAIN

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif's activation, it can perform either two Tirer actions or two Combattre actions.
If it's two Tirer actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif can Contre-attaquer regardless of its order.

Once per point tournant, you can do one of the following:
- Use a firefight ploy for 0CP if this is the specified ANGEL OF DEATH opératif (excluding Command Re-roll).
- Use the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy when you activate a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif if this opératif is in the zone de combat and isn't dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis (pay its CP cost as normal). Note that you cannot do so if you've already used that ploy during this point tournant.
- Use the Adjust Doctrine firefight ploy for 0CP if this opératif is in the zone de combat and not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.
Once per battle, when an attack die inflicts Normal Damage on this opératif, you can ignore that inflicted damage.

options.description:
*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
This opératif's melee weapons have the Rending weapon rule.

**Rending:** If you retain any critical hits, retain 1 normal hit as a critical hit instead.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
   
Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating, each of your succès normaux can block one unresolved succès critique (unless the opératif ennemi's weapon has the Brutal weapon rule).

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, dés de défense results of 5+ are succès critiques. Whenever this opératif is retaliating, the first time an dés d'attaque inflicts Normal Dmg of 3 or more on this opératif during that sequence, that dice inflicts 1 less damage on it.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  

- This opératif can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.
- This opératif can perform the Charge action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, and can leave that opératif's portée de contrôle to do so (but then normal requirements for that move apply).

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
You can ignore any changes to this opératif's APL stat and it isn't affected by opératifs ennemis' Shock weapon rule.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever this opératif is shooting during an activation in which it has not performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action, its bolt weapons have the Accurate 1 and Severe weapon rules.

**Severe:** If you do not retain any succès critiques, you can change one of your succès normaux to a succès critique. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a succès critique (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
This opératif's ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule.

**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain sauvegardes de couverture.

Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating, opératifs ennemis cannot assist.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, if you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a succès critique.
This is not cumulative with improved sauvegardes de couverture from Vantage terrain.

opTypes.keywords: ANGEL OF DEATH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, LEADER, ASSAULT INTERCESSOR, SERGEANT

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif's activation, it can perform either two Tirer actions or two Combattre actions.
If it's two Tirer actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif can Contre-attaquer regardless of its order.

At the end of the Select opératifs step, if this opératif is selected for deployment, select one additional CHAPTER TACTIC for it to have for the battle.
Unlike primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTICS, you don't have to select the same one for each battle in a campaign or tournament.

You can do each of the following once per battle:

- Whenever you would use the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy and then select Assault, if this opératif is in the zone de combat, it costs you 0CP.
- Whenever you would use the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy and then select Tactical, if this opératif is in the zone de combat, it costs you 0CP.

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif's activation, it can perform either two Tirer actions or two Combattre actions.
If it's two Tirer actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif can Contre-attaquer regardless of its order.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
This opératif has the Stealthy CHAPTER TACTIC. If you selected that CHAPTER TACTIC, you can do both of its options (i.e. retain two sauvegardes de couverture - one normal and one succès critique).

Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, if you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a succès critique.
This is not cumulative with improved sauvegardes de couverture from Vantage terrain.

Until the start of this opératif's next activation, whenever it is shooting, opératifs ennemis cannot be obscured.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif's activation, it can perform either two Tirer actions or two Combattre actions.
If it's two Tirer actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif can Contre-attaquer regardless of its order.

This opératif can use frag and krak grenades (see universal equipment).
Doing so does not count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other opératifs).
Whenever it is doing so, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1.

options.description:
*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
This opératif's melee weapons have the Rending weapon rule.

**Rending:** If you retain any critical hits, retain 1 normal hit as a critical hit instead.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
   
Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating, each of your succès normaux can block one unresolved succès critique (unless the opératif ennemi's weapon has the Brutal weapon rule).

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, dés de défense results of 5+ are succès critiques. Whenever this opératif is retaliating, the first time an dés d'attaque inflicts Normal Dmg of 3 or more on this opératif during that sequence, that dice inflicts 1 less damage on it.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  

- This opératif can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.
- This opératif can perform the Charge action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, and can leave that opératif's portée de contrôle to do so (but then normal requirements for that move apply).

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
You can ignore any changes to this opératif's APL stat and it isn't affected by opératifs ennemis' Shock weapon rule.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever this opératif is shooting during an activation in which it has not performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action, its bolt weapons have the Accurate 1 and Severe weapon rules.

**Severe:** If you do not retain any succès critiques, you can change one of your succès normaux to a succès critique. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a succès critique (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
This opératif's ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule.

**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain sauvegardes de couverture.

Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating, opératifs ennemis cannot assist.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, if you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a succès critique.
This is not cumulative with improved sauvegardes de couverture from Vantage terrain.

opTypes.keywords: ANGEL OF DEATH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, INTERCESSOR, GUNNER

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif's activation, it can perform either two Tirer actions or two Combattre actions.
If it's two Tirer actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif can Contre-attaquer regardless of its order.

ploys.description: Change your secondary CHAPTER TACTIC. Note this ploy only lasts until the end of the point tournant, at which point your original secondary CHAPTER TACTIC returns.

ploys.ployName: And They Shall Know No Fear
ploys.description: You can ignore any changes to the stats of friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératifs from being injured.

Select one COMBAT DOCTRINE from those presented below. Whenever a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif is x, its weapons have the Balanced weapon rule. X is the COMBAT DOCTRINE you selected.  


- **Devastator Doctrine:** Shooting Un opératif more than 6" from it.
- **Tactical Doctrine:** Shooting Un opératif within 6" of it.
- **Assault Doctrine:** Fighting or retaliating.

**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a succès normal instead.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action. If you have used the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy during this point tournant, change the COMBAT DOCTRINE you selected.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif is performing the Combattre action during an activation in which it has performed the Charge action, at the start of the Resolve dés d'attaque step.
Until the end of that action:

- Its melee weapon has the Shock weapon rule.
- The first time you strike during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage (to a maximum of 7).
  
**Shock:** The first time you strike with a succès critique in each sequence, also discard one of your opponent's unresolved succès normaux (or a succès critique if there are none).

Use this firefight ploy when Un opératif is shooting a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif, in the Roll dés de défense step.
You can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif is counteracting. It can perform an additional 1AP action for free during that contre-attaque, but both actions must be different.

equipments.description: You can use the Wrath of Vengeance firefight ploy for 0CP if the specified opératif allié has an Engage order.

Once per point tournant, when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a succès normal instead.

Once per point tournant, when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif is fighting or retaliating, after your opponent rolls their dés d'attaque, you can use this rule.
If you do, your opponent cannot retain dés d'attaque results of less than 6 as succès critiques during that sequence (e.g. as a result of the Lethal, Rending or Severe weapon rules).

Once per point tournant, when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH opératif performs the Tirer action and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of the activation (or contre-attaque), opératifs ennemis within 8" of it cannot be obscured.

description:
*"Let nothing dissuade your quest for knowledge. Let none slow your pursuit and acquisition of holy technology. Let none stand between you and the procurement of that which is rightfully the machine god's due."*  
- Thusdorius Knoch, Invictus Acquisitor
composition:
A BATTLECLADE KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 BATTLECLADE TECHNOARCHEOLOGIST
- 1 BATTLECLADE SERVITOR UNDERSEER
- 8 BATTLECLADE opératifs selected from the following list:
  - AUTO-PROXY SERVITOR
  - BREACHER SERVITOR
  - COMBAT SERVITOR with one of the following options:
    - Servo-claw; incendine igniter
    - Servo-claw; meltagun
    - Servo-claw; phosphor blaster
  - GUN SERVITOR with heavy arc rifle and augmetic claw
  - GUN SERVITOR with heavy bolter and augmetic claw
  - TECHNOMEDIC SERVITOR

Other than COMBAT SERVITOR opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.
Your kill team can only include up to one COMBAT SERVITOR opératif with meltagun, and it can only include up to three COMBAT SERVITOR opératifs with incendine igniter.

opTypes.keywords: BATTLECLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, TECH-PRIEST, LEADER, TECHNOARCHEOLOGIST

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif is activated, you can TRANSFER POWER.
If you do, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of that activation.  

After that activation, you can NETWORK Contre-attaquer with one other friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif before your opponent activates. Whenever you NETWORK Contre-attaquer with a opératif allié, first select its order.
It can then perform a 1AP action for free, but cannot move. Once it's done so, your opponent then activates as normal.  

Un opératif cannot TRANSFER POWER or NETWORK Contre-attaquer if it has an APL stat of less than 2 (e.g. if the stat has been changed to less than 2 by a rule).
NETWORK Contre-attaquer is a contre-attaque, but the opératif doesn't need to be expended with an Engage order to do it.
That means if they're ready when they NETWORK Contre-attaquer, they can still be activated as normal later in the point tournant. Un opératif that does NETWORK Contre-attaquer cannot do so again, or Contre-attaquer, during the same point tournant.

Select one opératif ennemi visible to or within 8" of this opératif to gain one of your Omniscanner tokens. Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that has one of your Omniscanner tokens, that opératif allié's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: BATTLECLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, AUTO-PROXY, SERVITOR

abilities.description: Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi visible to this opératif, that opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule. This rule has no effect if this opératif is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif is activated, you can TRANSFER POWER.
If you do, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of that activation.  

After that activation, you can NETWORK Contre-attaquer with one other friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif before your opponent activates. Whenever you NETWORK Contre-attaquer with a opératif allié, first select its order.
It can then perform a 1AP action for free, but cannot move. Once it's done so, your opponent then activates as normal.

That means if they're ready when they NETWORK Contre-attaquer, they can still be activated as normal later in the point tournant. Un opératif that does NETWORK Contre-attaquer cannot do so again, or Contre-attaquer, during the same point tournant.

Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the end of the point tournant, whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE opératif is shooting that opératif ennemi, you can use this effect. If you do:

- That opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: BATTLECLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, BREACHER, SERVITOR

Place one of your Breach markers within this opératif's portée de contrôle as close as possible to a terrain feature dans la portée de contrôle of it. Whenever Un opératif is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible terrain.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a terrain feature isn't within its portée de contrôle.

SUPPORT. Select one friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif within 6" of either this opératif or a friendly BATTLECLADE AUTO-PROXY opératif to immediately NETWORK Contre-attaquer (you don't have to TRANSFER POWER to do so).
Continue this opératif's activation after doing so.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.
For the purposes of the Comms Device universal equipment, the opératif the distance is being determined from must control that marker

SUPPORT. Select one friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif within 6" of either this opératif or a friendly BATTLECLADE AUTO-PROXY opératif to immediately perform a free Ruée action.
You cannot select each friendly SERVITOR opératif for this rule more than once per point tournant.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.
For the purposes of the Comms Device universal equipment, the opératif the distance is being determined from must control that marker

opTypes.keywords: BATTLECLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, MEDIC, TECHNOMEDIC, SERVITOR

abilities.description:
Once per point tournant, when another friendly BATTLECLADE opératif would be hors de combat while visible to and within 3" of this opératif, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that opératif is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi. If you do, that opératif allié isn't hors de combat, has 1 wound remaining and cannot be hors de combat for the remainder of the action.
After that action, that opératif allié can immediately perform a free Ruée action, but must end that move within this opératif's portée de contrôle.
If this rule was used during that opératif allié's activation, that activation ends. You cannot use this rule if this opératif is hors de combat, or if it's a Tirer action and this opératif would be a primary or secondary target.

Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif is activated, you can TRANSFER POWER.
If you do, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of that activation.  

After that activation, you can NETWORK Contre-attaquer with one other friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif before your opponent activates. Whenever you NETWORK Contre-attaquer with a opératif allié, first select its order.
It can then perform a 1AP action for free, but cannot move. Once it's done so, your opponent then activates as normal.  

Un opératif cannot TRANSFER POWER or NETWORK Contre-attaquer if it has an APL stat of less than 2 (e.g. if the stat has been changed to less than 2 by a rule).
NETWORK Contre-attaquer is a contre-attaque, but the opératif doesn't need to be expended with an Engage order to do it.
That means if they're ready when they NETWORK Contre-attaquer, they can still be activated as normal later in the point tournant. Un opératif that does NETWORK Contre-attaquer cannot do so again, or Contre-attaquer, during the same point tournant.

Select one friendly BATTLECLADE opératif within this opératif's portée de contrôle to regain up to D3+3 lost wounds. It cannot be Un opératif that the Mechanosuture Array rule was used on during this point tournant.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

ploys.description: Once per action, you can use the Command Re-roll firefight ploy for 0CP if the attack or dés de défense was rolled for a friendly BATTLECLADE opératif that contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers.
Whenever an dés d'attaque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly BATTLECLADE opératif, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

SUPPORT. Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif is within 6" of a friendly BATTLECLADE AUTO-PROXY or BATTLECLADE SERVITOR UNDERSEER opératif, that friendly SERVITOR opératif's weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.  

For the purposes of this SUPPORT rule and the Comms Device equipment, the AUTO-PROXY or SERVITOR UNDERSEER opératif must control your Comms Device marker to add 3" to its distance requirement for this rule.

Select one objective marker or one of your mission markers.

- Whenever determining control of that marker, treat the total APL stat of friendly BATTLECLADE opératifs that contest it as 1 higher if at least one friendly BATTLECLADE opératif contests that marker. Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
- Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE opératif is within 3" of that marker, add 1 to the Atk stat of its melee weapons (to a maximum of 4).

Use this firefight ploy when Un opératif is shooting a friendly BATTLECLADE TECH-PRIEST opératif, at the start of the Roll dés d'attaque step. Until the end of the sequence, ignore the Piercing weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly BATTLECLADE TECH-PRIEST opératif's activation. Once during that activation, you can use one of the following rules:

- That opératif doesn't require a marker to be within its portée de contrôle to perform a mission action that usually requires this (this takes precedence over that action's conditions).
Instead, the marker must be within 4" of it and no opératifs ennemis can contest that marker. However, you can ignore opératifs ennemis dans la portée de contrôle of other friendly BATTLECLADE opératifs when determining this.
- That opératif doesn't require a hatchway's access point to be within its portée de contrôle to perform an Operate Hatch action. Instead, that access point must be within 4" of it.

Use this firefight ploy when you would activate a friendly BATTLECLADE opératif. Remove one rules effect or stat change your opponent has applied to it (e.g. Poison token, -1APL, cannot be activated or perform actions, etc), then activate it. This ploy cannot allow it to regain lost wounds, ignore the effects of being injured, remove mission pack rulesor remove -1APL that you have applied to it (i.e. from TRANSFER POWER).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BATTLECLADE TECH-PRIEST opératif is selected as the valid target of a Tirer action or to Combattre against during the Combattre action.
Select one friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératif visible to and within 3" of that first opératif allié to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this).
If it's the Combattre action, treat that SERVITOR opératif as being within the fighting opératif's portée de contrôle for the duration of that action.
If it's the Tirer action, that SERVITOR opératif is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  

This ploy has no effect if it's the Tirer action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

equipments.description:
After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first point tournant, a number of friendly BATTLECLADE opératifs equal to the result that are wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Repositionner action, but must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.
Your TECHNOARCHEOLOGIST opératif cannot perform more than one Repositionner action in the Strategy phase of the first point tournant (i.e. as a result of the Seeker of Divine Arcana rule as well).
Friendly BATTLECLADE opératifs' melee weapons have the Shock weapon rule. Whenever a ready friendly BATTLECLADE opératif is retaliating, its melee weapons also have the Severe weapon rule.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the second point tournant.  

You can swap the locations of any number of friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR opératifs with each other (excluding GUN SERVITOR), and you can swap the locations of friendly BATTLECLADE GUN SERVITOR opératifs with each other (remove them from the zone de combat and set them back up again).
You cannot swap any opératifs that have done any of the following during the battle:

- Used any weapons on their datacard.
- Performed any actions on their datacard.
- Used the Mechanosuture Array rule(see TECHNOMEDIC).

After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. A number of times during the battle equal to the result, whenever you TRANSFER POWER, you can use this rule. If you do, don't subtract 1 from the opératif's APL stat, but it cannot perform Tirer or Combattre actions during that activation (this takes precedence over the normal Noospheric Network rules).

description: Athletic, graceful and utterly lethal, the Aeldari warriors that comprise Blades of Khaine kill teams come together to undertake missions of utmost importance on behalf of their craftworlds. They are dispatched to sever specific strands of fate, ensuring that terrible events they have foreseen never come to pass.
composition:
A BLADES OF KHAINE KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 BLADES OF KHAINE opératif selected from the following list:
  - DIRE AVENGER EXARCH with one of the following options:
    - Shuriken catapult; fists
      - Twin shuriken catapult; gun butts  
    Or one option from each of the following:
    - Diresword or power weapon
      - Shuriken pistol or shimmershield
  - HOWLING BANSHEE EXARCH with one of the following options:
    - Mirrorswords
      - Shuriken pistol; executioner
      - Shuriken pistol; power weapon
      - Shuriken pistol; triskele
      - Triskele; power weapon
  - STRIKING SCORPION EXARCH with one of the following options:
    - Shuriken pistol; biting blade
      - Shuriken pistol; scorpion's claw & chainsword
      - Twin shuriken pistols; twin chainswords  
- 7 BLADES OF KHAINE opératifs selected from the following list:
  - DIRE AVENGER WARRIOR
  - HOWLING BANSHEE WARRIOR
  - STRIKING SCORPION WARRIOR

opTypes.keywords: BLADES OF KHAINE, ALEDARI, ASURYANI, LEADER, DIRE AVENGER, EXARCH

abilities.description:
- You cannot use more than one ASPECT TECHNIQUE per activation or contre-attaque.
- You cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than once per point tournant.
- If every friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif selected for deployment has the same Aspect keyword (e.g. STRIKING SCORPION), you cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than twice per point tournant (instead of once).

##### Dire Avenger Aspect Techniques
**The Slicing Hurricane**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly DIRE AVENGER opératif is performing the Repositionner action.
That opératif can perform the Tirer action during that action (it must do so in a location it can be placed, and any remaining move distance it had from that Repositionner action can be used after it does so).
You must select its shuriken catapult, shuriken pistol or twin shuriken catapult for that Tirer action.
  
  

**Death Of A Thousand Blades**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly DIRE AVENGER opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a shuriken catapult or twin shuriken catapult.
Until the end of that action, that weapon has the Torrent 2" weapon rule, but you cannot select more than one secondary target.
  
  

**Vigilance Of The Avenger**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly DIRE AVENGER opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a shuriken catapult or twin shuriken catapult. Until the end of that action, that weapon has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.
  
  

**Unstinting, Immovable**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when Un opératif is shooting a friendly DIRE AVENGER opératif, and you've rolled two or more fails. You can discard one of them to retain the other as a succès normal instead.
  
  

**Raging Heat Of The Dying Flame**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE during a friendly DIRE AVENGER opératif's activation. Until the start of that opératif's next activation, you can ignore any changes to its stats from being injured (including its weapons' stats).
Whenever this opératif contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, or whenever it's shooting an opératif ennemi that does, this opératif's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
This opératif can perform two Combattre or two Tirer actions during its activation.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif that's visible to and within 2" of this opératif, ignore the Piercing weapon rule. This opératif only has this rule if you select the shimmershield weapon option.

opTypes.keywords: BLADES OF KHAINE, ALEDARI, ASURYANI, LEADER, HOWLING BANSHEE, EXARCH

abilities.description: Whenever this opératif is fighting, worsen the Hit stat of the opératif ennemi's melee weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.
This opératif can perform two Combattre or two Tirer actions during its activation.

- You cannot use more than one ASPECT TECHNIQUE per activation or contre-attaque.
- You cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than once per point tournant.
- If every friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif selected for deployment has the same Aspect keyword (e.g. STRIKING SCORPION), you cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than twice per point tournant (instead of once).

##### Howling Banshee Aspect Techniques

**The Woe**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE during a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE opératif's activation, after it's performed the Charge action and hors de combat an opératif ennemi during the Combattre action, and is no longer dans la portée de contrôle of
opératifs ennemis. That opératif allié can immediately perform a free Charge action using any remaining move distance it had from that first Charge action. That opératif can perform two Charge actions during its activation to do so. The opératif cannot have performed any other actions
during this activation (but can do so after resolving this ASPECT TECHNIQUE).

**Rain of Tears**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE opératif is fighting, after you strike with a succès critique if the opératif ennemi isn't hors de combat. End that sequence (any remaining dés d'attaque are discarded) and immediately perform a free Fall
Back action up to 3" with that opératif (then the Combattre action ends). That opératif can do so even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing the Repli action.

**Shriek-That-Kills**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE opératif is performing the Tirer action. Until the end of that action, that opératif can use the following ranged weapon:
|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|Shriek-That-Kills|5|3+|1/2|
|Weapon Rules|
|Range 6", Saturate, Seek Light, Stun, Torrent 1"|

**Acrobatic**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE opératif performs an action in which it moves. Until the end of the action, that opératif:

- Can ignore all vertical distances whenever it drops and climbs.
- Can move through opératifs ennemis, move dans la portée de contrôle of them, and during the Charge action can leave their portée de contrôle (it must still end the move following all requirements for that move).
- Cannot move more than its Move stat if it's the Charge action.

**Scream-That-Steals**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE opératif is fighting or retaliating, at the start of the Resolve dés d'attaque step. You can resolve one of your successes before the normal order.
If you do, that success must be used to block.

opTypes.keywords: BLADES OF KHAINE, ALEDARI, ASURYANI, LEADER, STRIKING SCORPION, EXARCH

abilities.description: This opératif can perform two Combattre or two Tirer actions during its activation.

- You cannot use more than one ASPECT TECHNIQUE per activation or contre-attaque. - You cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than once per point tournant. - If every friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif selected for deployment has the same Aspect keyword (e.g. STRIKING SCORPION), you cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than twice per point tournant (instead of once).  ##### Striking Scorpion Aspect Techniques **Patient Stalk, Sudden Blow**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly STRIKING SCORPION opératif that has a Conceal order performs the Repositionner action. During that action, that opératif can move dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis (it cannot end the move there), and you can inflict D3+2 damage on one opératif ennemi it moved dans la portée de contrôle of after it has moved.   
  
 **Strike and Fade**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly STRIKING SCORPION opératif incapacitates an opératif ennemi during the Combattre action, and is no longer within 3" of opératifs ennemis. Change that opératif allié's order to Conceal and it can immediately perform a free Ruée action, even if it has performed an action that prevents it from performing the Ruée action.   
  
 **Scorpion's Eye**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly STRIKING SCORPION opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a shuriken pistol. Until the end of that action, that weapon has the Seek Light weapon rule.   
  
 **Merciless Strikes**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly STRIKING SCORPION opératif is fighting, the first time you strike with a succès critique during that sequence. Until the end of that sequence, that opératif's melee weapon has the Shock weapon rule.   
  
 **One with the Gloom**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE during a friendly STRIKING SCORPION opératif's activation. Until the start of its next activation, while that opératif has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2".

ploys.description: Select two friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératifs visible to and within 6" of each other. Remove them both from the zone de combat and set them back up in each other's previous locations (in other words, swap their positions).
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a ready friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense results of one result (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif is shooting an expended opératif ennemi, that opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Whenever a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif is fighting a ready opératif ennemi, that opératif allié's melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif's activation. During that activation, that opératif can perform two Combattre actions.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif is retaliating or an opératif ennemi is shooting it, after your opponent rolls their dés d'attaque, but before re- rolls.
Until the end of the sequence, your opponent cannot re-roll their dés d'attaque (if your opponent declared the use of any firefight ploys during that sequence that would allow them to re-roll,
that ploy is cancelled and the CP spent on it is refunded).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action. During that activation, that opératif can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif's activation. During that activation, that opératif can perform two Tirer actions.

equipments.description: Once per battle, after rolling off to decide initiative, you can add D3 to, or subtract D3 from, your result.
Once per battle, when an dés d'attaque inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif, you can ignore that inflicted damage.
When this equipment is revealed, roll one D3. In the Strategy phase of the point tournant equal to the result, you gain 1 additional CP.

Once per point tournant, when a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE opératif is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a succès normal instead.

description:
Many Astra Militarum troops have turned to Chaos over the centuries, including entire regiments of the Astra Militarum's Imperial Army predecessors that followed the Warmaster Horus into battle against the Imperium during the Horus Heresy.
  
  

These Traitors represent the primary mortal troops available to the forces of Chaos, now known as the "Traitoris Militarum" in High Gothic to the defenders of the Imperium. Even ten millennia later, Chaos Lords are known to attract these followers of Chaos into their warbands and personal armies, which vary greatly in both size and strength.
composition:
A BLOODED killteam is composed of:
- 1 Blooded Chieftan opératif with one of the following options:
  - Autopistol or laspistol, chainsword or power weapon
  - Bolt Pistol, chainsword
  - Boltgun, bayonet
  - Plasma pistol, improvised Blade *(2)*
- 9 Blooded opératifs selected from the following list:
  - Brimstone Grenadier
  - Butcher
  - Commsman
  - Corpseman
  - Flenser
  - Gunner with bayonet and Flamer *(1)*
  - Gunner with bayonet and Grenade Launcher *(1)*
  - Gunner with bayonet and Meltagun *(1)*
  - Gunner with bayonet and plasma gun *(1,2)*
  - Sharpshooter *(1)*
  - Thug
  - Trench Sweeper
  - Trooper
- 4 Blooded opératifs selected from the following list:
 - Enforcer (counts as two selections)
 - Ogryn (counts as two selections)
 - Trooper

Other than Trooper opératifs your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.  

**(1):** You cannot select more than three of these opératifs combined  

**(2):** You cannot select this option and this opératif. In other words you can only have one opératif with a plasma weapon.

opTypes.keywords: BLOODED, CHAOS, CHIEFTAIN, LEADER

abilities.description:
Once per point tournant, when a friendly
BLOODED opératif that has one of your Blooded tokens is
hors de combat, if this opératif is within 6" of it, you can regain
that token.

You gain one Blooded token:

- In the ready step of each strategy phase.
- The first time an opératif ennemi is hors de combat during each point tournant.
- The first time a opératif allié is hors de combat within 6" of an opératif ennemi during each point tournant.

As a strategic gambit, you can assign any of your unassigned blooded tokens to friendly
blooded opératifs. Each opératif cannot have more than one of your blooded tokens.  

Then, if four or more opératifs alliés in the zone de combat have one of your Blooded tokens,
you can select one of them to be under the GAZE OF THE GODS until the end of the
point tournant.  

Whenever a friendly BLOODED opératif has one of your Blooded tokens, its weapons
have the accurate 1 weapon rule. If that friendly BLOODED opératif is under the GAZE
OF THE GODS, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a result of the Accurate
1 weapon rule as a succès critique instead.

Whenever this opératif has one of your
Blooded tokens or is wholly within your opponent's territory
treat it as if it is under the GAZE OF THE GODS.

opTypes.keywords: BLOODED, CHAOS, BRIMSTONE GRENADIER

abilities.description:
You gain one Blooded token:

- In the ready step of each strategy phase.
- The first time an opératif ennemi is hors de combat during each point tournant.
- The first time a opératif allié is hors de combat within 6" of an opératif ennemi during each point tournant.

As a strategic gambit, you can assign any of your unassigned blooded tokens to friendly
blooded opératifs. Each opératif cannot have more than one of your blooded tokens.  

Then, if four or more opératifs alliés in the zone de combat have one of your Blooded tokens,
you can select one of them to be under the GAZE OF THE GODS until the end of the
point tournant.  

Whenever a friendly BLOODED opératif has one of your Blooded tokens, its weapons
have the accurate 1 weapon rule. If that friendly BLOODED opératif is under the GAZE
OF THE GODS, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a result of the Accurate
1 weapon rule as a succès critique instead.

If this opératif is hors de combat, before it is removed from the zone de combat, you can use this rule. If you do, roll 2d6, or 1d6 if this opératif is within control range of an opératif ennemi. If any result is a 4+, inflict d3+2 damage on each opératif visible 2 and within 2" of this opératif. If thios opératif has not used its Diabolyk Bomb during the battle, inflict d6+2 damage instead.

This opératif can use frag and krak grenades (See
universal equipment). Doing so does not count towards any limited
uses you have (i.e, if you also select those grenades from equipment
for other opératifs. Whenever it is doing so, improve the Hit stat of
that weapon by 1.

opTypes.keywords: BLOODED, CHAOS, BUTCHER

abilities.description:
You gain one Blooded token:

- In the ready step of each strategy phase.
- The first time an opératif ennemi is hors de combat during each point tournant.
- The first time a opératif allié is hors de combat within 6" of an opératif ennemi during each point tournant.

As a strategic gambit, you can assign any of your unassigned blooded tokens to friendly
blooded opératifs. Each opératif cannot have more than one of your blooded tokens.  

Then, if four or more opératifs alliés in the zone de combat have one of your Blooded tokens,
you can select one of them to be under the GAZE OF THE GODS until the end of the
point tournant.  

Whenever a friendly BLOODED opératif has one of your Blooded tokens, its weapons
have the accurate 1 weapon rule. If that friendly BLOODED opératif is under the GAZE
OF THE GODS, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a result of the Accurate
1 weapon rule as a succès critique instead.

Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating,
if it incapacitates the opératif ennemi in that sequence, it regains d3
lost wounds. This is cumulative with the Symbols of Bloody Worship
Equipment.

ploys.description: Whenever a friendly BLOODED opératif is hors de combat, before it is removed from the zone de combat, roll 1D3; on a 3 (or 2+ if that opératif allié has one of your Blooded tokens), inflict damage equal to the result on one opératif ennemi visible to and within 2" of that opératif allié.

Select one enemey opératif visible to a friendly BLOODED opératif. Until the end of the point tournant, whenever a friendly BLOODED opératif is shooting against, fighting against, or retaliating against that opératif ennemi, its weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule, or Relentless if that shooting, fighting, or retaliating opératif has one of your Blooded tokens.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dés d'attaque.
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly BLOODED opératif that has one of your Blooded tokens or is wholly within your opponent's territory, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.

Whenever a friendly BLOODED opératif that is wholly within your opponent's territory and does not have one of your Blooded tokens is shooting or fighting, its weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.  

Whenever a friendly BLOODED opératif that has one of your blooded tokens is wholly within your opponent's territory, its weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.  
**Punishing:** If you retain any succès critiques, you can retain one of your fails as a succès normal instead of discarding it.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a succès normal without rolling it.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BLOODED opératif performs the Tirer action and you are selecting a valid target.
Having other friendly BLOODED opératifs within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle does not prevent that opératif ennemi from being selected.
Until the end of that action, whenever you discard an attack die as a fail, inflict damage equal to the die result on one opératif allié of your choice dans la portée de contrôle of the target.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BLOODED opératif that has one of your Blooded tokens is selected as the valid target of a Tirer action or to Combattre against during the Combattre action. Select one other friendly BLOODED opératif visible to and within 3" of that first opératif allié to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead, even if it normally would not be valid for this. If it is the Combattre action, treat that other opératif as being within the fighting opératif's portée de contrôle for the duration of that action. If it is the Tirer action, that other opératif is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  
 This ploy has no effect if it is the Tirer action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent special rule.

Use this firefight ploy during the activation fo a friendly BLOODED opératif that is under the GAZE OF THE GODS before or after it performs an action.  

Until the end of that opératif's activation, add 1 to its APL stat.

Use this firefight ploy when an opératif ennemi is hors de combat by a friendly BLOODED opératif within 2" of it that has one of your Blooded tokens.  

You gain one Blooded token.

equipments.description: The Reward Earned firefight ploy costs you 0 CP.

Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting against, fighting against, or retaliating against a friendly BLOODED opératif that has one of your Blooded tokens and is within 2" of it,
your opponent cannot re-roll their dés d'attaque results of 1.
Whenever a friendly BLOODED opératif ends an action, if it was not hors de combat but inflicted damage on any opératifs ennemis during that action, it regains 1 lost wound.
Add 1 to both Dmg stats of each friendly BLOODED opératif's bayonet, bayonet and shield, and improvised blade for the battle.

description:
Brood Brothers are the humans of the Genestealer Cults, who have been implanted by Genestealers and have served as hosts for their Genestealer Hybrid offspring.  

Many of these Brood Brothers may be members of the local civil or military authorities, continuing to carry out their normal duties in society. They remain hidden until the cult/clan is powerful enough to completely take control of the host society. They regard and often venerate the Genestealer Patriarch as a grandfather or deity. They are especially fanatic members of the clan, motivated by intense, instinctual bonds to their Genestealer and Hybrid relatives.
composition:
A BROOD BROTHER KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 BROOD BROTHER Commander opératif with one of the following options:
  - Bolt pistol, chainsword and claw
  - Drum-fed autogun, bayonet,
  - Laspistol, power weapon and claw=
- 9 BROOD BROTHER opératifs selected from the following list:
  - Agitator
  - Gunner with Flamer and bayonet (1)
  - Gunner with Grenade Launcher and bayonet (1)
  - Gunner with Meltagun and bayonet (1)
  - Gunner with Plasma gun and bayonet (1)
  - Iconward
  - Knife Fighter
  - Medic
  - Sapper
  - Sniper (1)
  - Trooper
  - Veteran
  - Vox-Operator
- 3 Brood Brother opératifs selected from the following list (3):
  - 2 Psychic Familiar opératifs (Still count as one selection)
  - Magus (Count as two selections) (2)
  - Patriarch (Count as three selections) (2)
  - Primus (Count as two selections) (2)
  - Trooper

Other than Trooper opératifs, your kill team can only include each option on this list once.  

(1) You cannot select more than three of these opératifs combined.  

(2) Your kill team can only include up to one BROODCOVEN opératif. If one of these opératifs is selected for deployment, your Commander opératif loses the Leader keyword for the battle.  

(3) Up to three times, instead of selecting one of these opératifs, you can select one BROOD BROTHER ploy to cost you 0CP for the battle. Note that "count as" selections still apply; for example, if you select a Patriarch opératif, you could not do this.

opTypes.keywords: BROOD BROTHER, GENESTEALER CULT, BROODGUARD, LEADER, COMMANDER

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against or fighting against an opératif ennemi, after resolving all of your dés d'attaque, if that opératif ennemi is not hors de combat it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dés d'attaque.

Doing so does not count towards any limited uses you have (i.e, if you also select those grenades from equipment for other opératifs).

The first time this opératif performs this action during the battle, place your Explosives marker within its portée de contrôle.
The second time this opératif performs this action during the battle, inflict 2D6 damage on each opératif within 2" of that marker (roll separately for each) unless Heavy Terrain is wholly intervening between that opératif and that marker.  

This opératif cannot perform this action more than twice per battle, while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or during the same activation in which it performed the Charge, Ruée or Repli action (or vice-versa).

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against or fighting against an opératif ennemi, after resolving all of your dés d'attaque, if that opératif ennemi is not hors de combat it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dés d'attaque.

Select one ready opératif ennemi that is a valid target for this opératif, or visible to this opératif instead if you spend 1 additional AP.
Roll 1D6, until the end of the point tournant, that opératif ennemi cannot be activated or perform actions until it is the last opératif ennemi to be activated, or until your opponent has activated a number of opératifs ennemis after this action equal to the roll (whichever comes first)  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

**SUPPORT**  

Select one other friendly BROOD BROTHER BROODGUARD opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif. Until the end of that opératif's next activation add 1 to its APL stat.

Whenever this opératif is expended, you must then activate any other ready friendly BROOD BROTHER TROOPER opératif (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two opératifs as specified with this rule).

opTypes.keywords: BROOD BROTHER, GENESTEALER CULT, BROODCOVEN, LEADER, PSYKER, MAGUS

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against or fighting against an opératif ennemi, after resolving all of your dés d'attaque, if that opératif ennemi is not hors de combat it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dés d'attaque.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT if this opératif is in the zone de combat. Select one of the following for friendly BROOD BROTHER opératifs to have until the end of the point tournant or until this opératif is hors de combat (whichever comes first):  - Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif, ignore the piercing rule. - You can ignore any changes to friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif's stats from being injured (including their weapons' stats). - You can ignore any changes to the APL stats of friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one opératif ennemi that is a valid target to this opératif.
Inflict 2 damage on it, or 4 damage instead if it is within 6" of this opératif.
Then roll 1D6, if the result is higher than that enemy's APL stat, inflict an additional 2 damage on it, or 4 damage instead if it is within 6" of this opératif.
Keep rolling 1D6 in this manner until you roll equal to or less than that opératif ennemi's APL stat, until it is hors de combat, or until you inflict 8 damage on it during this action (whichever comes first).  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the end of that opératif's next activation, subtract 1 from its APL stat.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: BROOD BROTHER, GENESTEALER CULT, PSYCHIC FAMILIAR

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against or fighting against an opératif ennemi, after resolving all of your dés d'attaque, if that opératif ennemi is not hors de combat it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dés d'attaque.

This opératif can perform mission actions while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi (taking precedence over those actions' normal conditions).
It can move through opératifs ennemis, move dans la portée de contrôle of them, and during the Charge action can leave their portée de contrôle (it must still end the move following all requirements for that move).

Whenever this opératif is expended, you must then activate any other ready friendly BROOD BROTHER PSYCHIC FAMILIAR opératif (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

This opératif cannot use any weapons that are not on its datacard, or perform unique actions. Whenever this opératif has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (i.e, Seek, Vantage Terrain) except being within 2". This opératif can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.

opTypes.keywords: BROOD BROTHER, GENESTEALER CULT, BROODCOVEN, LEADER, PSYKER, PATRIARCH

abilities.description:
Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, ignore the Piercing weapon rule.
You can activate this opératif twice during the point tournant as long as it has AP to spend (it stays ready while it can still be activated a second time).
Per point tournant it cannot move more than 9" and you cannot spend more than 4AP in total for it.

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against or fighting against an opératif ennemi, after resolving all of your dés d'attaque, if that opératif ennemi is not hors de combat it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dés d'attaque.

This opératif cannot use any weapons that are not on its datacard, or perform unique actions (excluding Into Shadow and Mind Control).
Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, if this opératif has a conceal order, it cannot use Light terrain for cover.
While this can allow this opératif to be targeted (assuming it is visible), it does not remove its cover save (if any).

Change this opératif's order.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one opératif ennemi visible to and within 2" of this opératif.
Both players roll 1D6 and add their respective opératif's APL stat to the total.
If your total is higher than your opponent's you can resolve this action's second effect.  

Until the end of the activation, that opératif ennemi is a opératif allié (an opératif ennemi for you opponent), you can change its order and it can immediately perofrm one free action.
It cannot perform an action in which it moves other than Ruée (in which case specify the location for your opponent to move this opératif to).
You can only resolve this action's second effect once per battle.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, unless the only opératif ennemi it is dans la portée de contrôle of is selected for this action.

opTypes.keywords: BROOD BROTHER, GENESTEALER CULT, BROODCOVEN, LEADER, PRIMUS

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against or fighting against an opératif ennemi, after resolving all of your dés d'attaque, if that opératif ennemi is not hors de combat it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dés d'attaque.
This opératif can perform either two Tirer or two Combattre actions during its activation.

Once per point tournant, after rolling off to determine initiative, if this opératif is in the zone de combat, you can do one of the following (you cannot select each option more than once per battle):  - Add 1 to your dice result. - If you did not have initiative in the previous point tournant, re-roll your dice.

You gain 1 CP.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or more than once per point tournant.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif (excluding PATRIARCH) is hors de combat when fighting or retaliating,
if you have any unresolved dés d'attaque, you can roll 1D6.
If the result is a success as if it were the Roll dés d'attaque step of that sequence (i.e, using the same weapon, but with no re-rolls), you can strike the opératif ennemi in that sequence with one of your unresolved
succès normaux, or any of your successes instead if the 1D6 result is a succès critique. In either case, that opératif allié is removed from the zone de combat afterwards.
Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif, if you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture as a result of Heavy terrain, you can retain one additional cover save.
During friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif's activation, you can ignore the first vertical distance of 2" they move during one climb up.

The first time each friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif performs either the Tirer or Combattre action during each of its activations,
if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activation,
the opératif ennemi selected as the valid target or to Combattre against gains one of your Crossfire tokens as soon as it is selected (instead of after resolving your dés d'attaque).  

This ploy has no effect if that opératif allié was activated dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.  

Note this ploy cannot come into effect more than once per activation (you cannot use it during both the Tirer and the Combattre action in the same activation).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BROOD BROTHER LEADER opératif is selected as the valid target of a Tirer action or to Combattre against during the Combattre action. Select one other friendly BROOD BROTHER BROODGUARD opératif (excluding LEADER) visible to and within 3" of that LEADER opératif to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it normally would not be valid for this. If it is the Combattre action, treat that other opératif as being within the fighting opératif's portée de contrôle for the duration of that action. If it is the Tirer action, that other opératif is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  
 This ploy has no effect if it is the Tirer action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy when selecting a valid target for a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif. Until the end of the action, determine Visibility as normal, but you can instead determine intervening (for cover and obscured) from another friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif that both that opératif allié and the potential valid target are visible to, but that is not itself dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.  
 Note the opératif allié does not gain the additional benefits of Vantage terrain if the other opératif is on it (e.g, to target an opératif ennemi that has a conceal order that is in cover provided by only Light Terrain.

Use this firefight ploy after an activation. Before the next activation, you can perform a free Ruée action with one friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif, as long as it is not a valid target for an opératif ennemi when it starts and ends that action. You cannot use this ploy during the first point tournant.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif (excluding LEADER) within 6" of a friendly BROOD BROTHER LEADER or friendly BROOD BROTHER ICONWARD opératif is shooting,
fighting or retaliating, in the Roll dés d'attaque Step. You can retain one of your fails as a succès normal instead of discarding it, or retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.

equipments.description:
After revealing this equipment option, roll 1D3.
As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first point tournant, a number of friendly BROOD BROTHER BROODGUARD opératifs equal to the result that are wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free
Repositionner action, but must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.

Friendly BROOD BROTHER BROODGUARD opératifs have the following melee weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Cult Knife|3|4+|3/4|

Once per point tournant, when Un opératif is shooting a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif (Excluding Patriarch), in the roll dés de défense step, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.
STRATEGIC GAMBIT: Select one opératif ennemi visible to a friendly BROOD BROTHER opératif to gain one of your Crossfire tokens.

description: Canoptek Circle kill teams comprise sinister alien constructs in thrall to their Cryptek master. The emotionless and unliving Canoptek constructs overcome obstacles to a Cryptek's ambitions, whether rock and metal or the bodies of the living, while their master accesses nodes of power and data to Charge the constructs' ancient abilities further.
composition:
A CANOPTEK CIRCLE Killteam is composed of:

- 1 CANOPTEK CIRCLE GEOMANCER opératif
- 2 CANOPTEK CIRCLE TOMB CRAWLER opératifs with one of the following options (select separately for each):
  - Twin gauss reapers; claws
  - Transdimensional isolator; claws*
- 1 CANOPTEK CIRCLE ACCELERATOR opératif
- 1 CANOPTEK CIRCLE REANIMATOR opératif
- 3 CANOPTEK CIRCLE WARRIOR opératifs with one of the following options (select separately for each):
  - Gauss scalpel; claws & tail
  - Tesla caster; claws & tail

*Your kill team can only include up to one transdimensional isolator.

opTypes.keywords: CANOPTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, CANOPTEK, MACROCYTE, REANIMATOR

abilities.description:
SUPPORT. Select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE CANOPTEK opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif. Alternatively, you can select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE CANOPTEK opératif that's visible to this opératif and within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX (SUPPORT doesn't apply to this selection).
That selected opératif can immediately perform a 1AP action for free; it cannot move more than 2" during that action.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi

Select a point on a terrain feature; that point must be visible to and within 8" of this opératif. Separately roll 2D6 for each opératif within 2" of that point. If the result is higher than that opératif's remaining wounds, inflict damage on it equal to the difference.

This opératif cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

SUPPORT. Select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif. Alternatively, you can select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif visible to this opératif and within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX (SUPPORT doesn't apply to this selection).

The next time the selected opératif performs an action in which it moves, don't move it. Instead, remove it from the zone de combat and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat (or 3" if it was a Ruée) horizontally of its
original location (in a zone de combat that uses the close quarters rules, e.g. zone de combat: Tomb World, this distance can be measured over and through Wall terrain and the opératif can be set up on the other side). Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Charge action.
It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it's the Charge action, it cannot be set up dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first point tournant, place your three OBELISK NODE markers wholly within your territory. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in each point tournant after the first, you can move your OBELISK NODE markers up to 3" each.

Your OBELISK NODE markers control other markers within 1" of them that no opératifs ennemis contest (treat your OBELISK NODE markers as opératifs alliés for this purpose).
If more than one player would use their OBELISK NODE markers to control the same marker, no OBELISK NODE markers control it.

Whenever one of your OBELISK NODE markers is within 6" horizontally of another of your OBELISK NODE markers, those markers and the area between them create an OBELISK NODE MATRIX above and below (in other words, their height in the zone de combat is irrelevant).
If all three of your OBELISK NODE markers fulfil this, it creates a larger combined OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX:
- Weapons on its datacard have the Accurate 2 weapon rule.
- Add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3).

Whenever this opératif would perform a mission action, if it requires this opératif to control an objective marker, you can instead determine control from one of your OBELISK NODE markers (see Obelisk Node Matrix faction rule).
Whenever this opératif would perform the Operate Hatch action, you can open or close a hatchway thats access point is within 1" of one of your OBELISK NODE markers instead.
Note that you must still fulfil the Operate Hatch action's conditions.
