Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, if this opératif has a Conceal order, it cannot use Light terrain for cover. While this can allow this opératif to be targeted (assuming it's visible), it doesn't remove its cover save (if any)

ploys.description: Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif, if your OBELISK NODE MATRIX is intervening, or that opératif allié is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense results of one result (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif is shooting, if your OBELISK NODE MATRIX is intervening, or the target is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, that opératif allié's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

Once per action, the first time an opératif ennemi would move within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, the distance is treated as an additional 1". Note this means if that opératif ennemi doesn't have sufficient move distance (e.g. it's at the end of its move), that opératif cannot move within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX.

Whenever an opératif ennemi is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, or whenever it's fighting or retaliating against a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif that's within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, subtract 1 from both Dmg stats of that opératif ennemi's melee weapons (to a minimum of 2) until the end of the activation/contre-attaque. Note this means if the opératif ennemi moves through your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, apply this change at the end of that move action until the end of the activation/contre-attaque.

Use this firefight ploy when an dés d'attaque inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif. If your OBELISK NODE MATRIX is intervening, or that opératif allié is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, ignore that inflicted damage. Note your opponent determines intervening (i.e. where on their opératif's base to draw the targeting lines from).

Use this firefight ploy when it's your turn to activate or Contre-attaquer. Move any number of your OBELISK NODE markers instead. They can move up to 6" combined, and distances are always rounded up to the nearest inch (so if you move a marker 1.5", it's treated as moving it 2"). For example, you could move one marker 6", three markers 1" each, or any combination that doesn't exceed 6" in total. You can also move them 0" (to effectively skip an activation). In any case, your opponent activates as normal afterwards.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action. You can either change one of the strategy ploys you used during this point tournant (only pay additional CP if that ploy costs more), or use a strategy ploy now (pay its CP cost as normal).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE GEOMANCER opératif is selected as the valid target of a Tirer action or to Combattre against during the Combattre action.
Select one other friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE CANOPTEK opératif visible to and within 3" of that first opératif allié to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this).
If it's the Combattre action, treat that other opératif as being within the fighting opératif's portée de contrôle for the duration of that action. If it's the Tirer action, that other opératif is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.

This ploy has no effect if it's the Tirer action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

equipments.description: Once per battle, during a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif's activation or contre-attaque, you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that activation/contre-attaque, a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE GEOMANCER opératif is treated as your fourth OBELISK NODE marker.
After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. You can use the Animate Obelisk Nodes firefight ploy for 0CP a number of times during the battle equal to the result.
Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE opératif is activated, it regains up to D3 lost wounds.

Once per point tournant, when Un opératif is shooting a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE GEOMANCER opératif, at the start of the Roll dés de défense step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

description: Wherever bitterness and discontent fester, so does the worship of the Dark Gods take hold. Zealous bands of cultists throng to the banners of malefic powers. The most monstrous of these zealots are warped beyond recognition, sprouting chitinous claws, leathery wings and all manner of mutations with which to slaughter their enemies.
composition:
A CHAOS CULT killteam is composed of:
 
- 1 CULT DEMAGOGUE opératif
- 2 BLESSED BLADE opératifs
- 9 CHAOS DEVOTEE opératifs
- 1 ICONARCH opératif
- 1 MINDWITCH opératif

opTypes.keywords: CHAOS CULT, CHAOS, LEADER, DARK COMMUNE, CULT DEMAGOGUE

abilities.description:
ACCURSED GIFTS are rules that friendly CHAOS CULT opératifs gain when they turn into another opératif type (see Mutation faction rule).
The first time a friendly DEVOTEE opératif turns into a MUTANT opératif during the battle, select your primary ACCURSED GIFT.
The first time a friendly MUTANT opératif turns into a TORMENT opératif during the battle, select your secondary ACCURSED GIFT.  

All friendly MUTANT opératifs have your primary ACCURSED GIFT, and all friendly TORMENT opératifs have your primary and secondary ACCURSED GIFTS. You cannot select the same ACCURSED GIFT more than once per battle.

During the battle, friendly CHAOS CULT opératifs can MUTATE as follows:

- As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, you can MUTATE a number of friendly CHAOS CULT opératifs based on the point tournant as follows: TP1 = 2, TP2 = 2, TP3 = 3, TP4+ = 4.
- Whenever a friendly DEVOTEE opératif incapacitates an opératif ennemi within its portée de contrôle, it can MUTATE.
- ach opératif cannot MUTATE more than once per point tournant.


Whenever a opératif allié MUTATES, select one of the following:

- If it's a DEVOTEE opératif, turn it into a MUTANT opératif.
- If it's a MUTANT opératif, turn it into a TORMENT opératif (max twice per point tournant).
- It can regain up to D3+1 lost wounds.


You cannot have more than five MUTANT opératifs and three TORMENT opératifs at once. Whenever a opératif allié turns into a new opératif:

- Swap the miniatures, ensuring the centre of the new miniature's base is as close as possible to where the centre of the old miniature's base was. This can put it dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, and if the old miniature was, the new miniature must be if possible.
- The new opératif type loses a number of wounds equal to the lost wounds of its preceding opératif type.
- It's still the same opératif for any rules it's already been selected for. The opératif is simply a new opératif type and will use that new type's miniature and datacard rules.

**SUPPORT** One other friendly CHAOS CULT opératif visible to and within 9" of this opératif can immediately perform a free Combattre action.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

**SUPPORT** One other friendly CHAOS CULT opératif visible to and within 9" of this opératif can immediately perform a free Charge or Ruée action (for the former, it cannot move more than 3").  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: CHAOS CULT, CHAOS, DARK COMMUNE, BLESSED BLADE

**PSYCHIC**
Select one of the following effects to last until the start of this opératif's next activation, until it's hors de combat or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first):

- **Invigoration:** Whenever a friendly CHAOS CULT opératif is within 4" of this opératif, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on that opératif.
- **Deterioration:** Whenever an opératif ennemi is within 4" of this opératif, Normal and Critical Dmg inflicts 1 more damage on that opératif.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

ploys.description:
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of opératifs ennemis that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those opératifs ennemis is within 2" of friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT opératifs.  

Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

You can ignore any changes to the Hit stat of friendly CHAOS CULT opératifs' weapons from being injured. Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly CHAOS CULT opératif that's wounded, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.

Friendly CHAOS CULT opératifs' melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule, or the Accurate 2 weapon rule if that opératif allié is a MUTANT or TORMENT opératif.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a succès normal without rolling it.

Whenever an opératif ennemi is within 2" of friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT opératifs, worsen the Hit stat of that opératif ennemi's weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CHAOS CULT opératif (excluding DARK COMMUNE) is activated.
Select an ACCURSED GIFT for that opératif to gain. This is in addition to any ACCURSED GIFTS it already has.
Each opératif allié cannot be selected for this ploy more than once per battle, and if that opératif turns into a different one (see Mutation faction rule), it still has that ACCURSED GIFT.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT opératif is hors de combat, before it is removed from the zone de combat. Inflict D3 damage (or D6 damage instead if that opératif allié is a TORMENT) on one opératif ennemi visible to and within 2" of that opératif allié.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CHAOS CULT DARK COMMUNE opératif is selected as the valid target of a Tirer action or to Combattre against during the Combattre action. Select one other friendly CHAOS CULT opératif (excluding DARK COMMUNE) visible to and within 3" of that DARK COMMUNE opératif to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this). If it's the Combattre action, treat that other opératif as being within the fighting opératif's portée de contrôle for the duration of that action. If it is the Tirer action, that other opératif is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  
 This ploy has no effect if it's the Tirer action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT opératif's activation. During that activation, that opératif can perform two Combattre actions, and one of them can be free.

equipments.description: Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Change one of your ACCURSED GIFTS. Note that if it is an ACCURSED GIFT Un opératif has from the Abhorrent Mutation firefight ploy, only that opératif benefits from this.

After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first point tournant, a number of friendly CHAOS CULT DEVOTEE opératifs equal to the result that are wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform
a free Repositionner action, but must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.
Once per point tournant, when Un opératif is shooting a friendly CHAOS CULT opératif, in the Roll dés de défense step, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.

Once per battle, when an dés d'attaque inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly CHAOS CULT opératif (excluding DEVOTEE), you can ignore that inflicted damage.
If that opératif allié is a MUTANT or TORMENT opératif, you cannot roll for the Unnatural Regeneration rule for that dés d'attaque then decide to use this rule on the same dice - you must use one or the other.

description:
Aeldari Corsairs or Anhrathe are bands of piratical Aeldari Outcasts. They are a constant threat to merchant shipping, though very rarely pose a threat to a major Imperial battlefleet.
  
  

There are many bands of so-called Corsairs scattered across the galaxy, and all are savage and deadly raiders. Outcasts from the strict confines of the Craftworlds, the Corsairs live in self-imposed exile, seeking to explore the galaxy and experience the full gamut of emotion and sensation accessible to the Eldar's sensitive psyche.
composition:
A CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED killteam is composed of:
- 1 CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED Felarch opératif with one of the following options:
  - Shuriken rifle, shuriken pistol, power weapon
  - Neuro Disruptor, Power weapon
- 8 CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératifs selected from the following list:
  - Fate Dealer
  - Gunner with one of the following options:
  - Blaster (X), Shuriken pistol, fists
    - Shredder, Shuriken pistol, fists
  - Heavy Gunner with one of the following options:
    - Shuriken Cannon, Shuriken pistol, fists
    - Wraithcannon (X), Shuriken pistol, fists  
  - Kurnathi
  - Kurnite Hunter
  - Shade Runner
  - Soul Weaver
  - Starstorm Duelist
  - Warrior with one of the following options:
    - Shuriken pistol, power weapon
  - Shuriken rifle, fists  
  - Way Seeker

Other than Warrior opératifs your kill team can only include each opératif on this lists once.  

(X) Your kill team cannot include both a blaster and a wraithcannon.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, FELARCH, LEADER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

Once per battle, after an opératif ennemi performs an action during its activation, if this opératif is ready, you can use this rule.
If you do so, roll 1D6, if the result is higher than that opératif ennemi's APL stat, you can interrupt that activation and immediately perform either a free Tirer or a free Combattre action with this opératif,
but other opératifs ennemis cannot be selected as a valid target or to Combattre against during that action (Note that secondary targets from the blast weapon rule can still be targeted).
After you perform that action, subtract 1 from this opératif's APL stat until the end of its next activation.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif is shooting with a shuriken rifle or ranger long rifle during an activation in which it has not performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action,
that opératif has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that opératif is not restricted from performing those actions after shooting.
This opératif can perform a 1AP action for free during their activation as a result of the Aeldari Raiders rule (instead of the Ruée action).

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, GUNNER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, HEAVY GUNNER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, FATE DEALER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a succès critique instead.

This is not cumulative with improved sauvegardes de couverture from vantage terrain.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif is shooting with a shuriken rifle or ranger long rifle during an activation in which it has not performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action,
that opératif has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that opératif is not restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, KURNATHI

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

This opératif can perform the Ruée action during an activation in which it has performed the Charge action, but can only use any remaining move distance it had from that Charge action (to a maximum of 3").
Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating, you can resolve one of your successes before the normal order. If you do, that success must be used to block.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, KURNITE HUNTER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**    Select one opératif ennemi within 9" of this opératif. Once during this point tournant, during that opératif ennemi's activation, after it performs an action in which it moves, you can interrupt that activation and perform either a free Repositionner action with this opératif (it cannot end that move further from that opératif ennemi) or a free Charge action with this opératif (you can change its order to do so, and it must end that move dans la portée de contrôle of that opératif ennemi).

The first time during each point tournant that this opératif is retaliating, if it is ready, in the Resolve dés d'attaque step of that sequence, you resolve the first dés d'attaque (i.e, defender instead of attacker).

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, SOUL WEAVER, PSYKER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one other friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif. Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif. That opératif regains 2D3 lost wounds.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, SHADE RUNNER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

Whenever this opératif performs the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action, it can Warp Jump. If it does, do not move it, instead remove it from the zone de combat and set it back up wholly within 7" of its original location, measuring the Horizontal distance only (in zone de combat Gallowdark, this distance can be measured through walls). It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it is the Charge action, it cannot be set up dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi. This opératif cannot Warp Jump during the same activation in which it performed the Ruée action (or vice-versa).

Whenever this opératif performs the Repositionner action with a Warp Jump (See Blink Pack), you can use this rule. If you do, after it moves, draw an imaginary line 1mm in diameter and up to 7" long between it and its previous location. Note this does not have to be a straight line. Inflict 1D3+2 damage on one opératif ennemi that line crosses. You cannot inflict damage on an opératif ennemi that was not visible to this opératif at the start of that action. A 28mm round marker can be temporarily placed underneath this opératif before it moves to help determine this.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, STARSTORM DUELLIST

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

This opératif can perform the Tirer action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.
If it does, when selecting a valid target, you can only select an opératif ennemi within this opératif's portée de contrôle, and can do so even if other opératifs alliés are within that opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle.

Perform 2 free Tirer actions with this opératif (this takes precedence over action restrictions). You must select its fusion pistol for one action and its shuriken pistol for the other (in any order).  
 This opératif cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or during an activation in which it performed the Tirer action (or vice versa).

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, PSYKER, WAY SEEKER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.

*PSYCHIC*  
 Select 2 Friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératifs visible to and within 5" of this opératif. Remove them both from the zone de combat and set them back up in each other's locations (in other words, swap their positions). If one of them performed a Charge, Repli, or Repositionner option during this point tournant and the other is ready, the other cannot perform any of those actions in its activation during this point tournant.  
 This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

*PSYCHIC*  
  Select one Friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif.  Until the start of this opératif's next activation, until it is hors de combat, or until it performs this action again (Whichever comes first), the first time an dés d'attaque inflicts normal damage on that opératif allié, ignore that inflicted damage.  
 This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, WARRIOR

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif can perform a free Ruée action during their activation.
You can use the Capricious Flight and Light Fingers firefight ploys for 0cp each if a friendly WARRIOR is the specified CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif is shooting with a shuriken rifle or ranger long rifle during an activation in which it has not performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action,
that opératif has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that opératif is not restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

ploys.description: Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif that performed an action in which it moved during this point tournant, you can re-roll one of your dice.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif is more than 5" from other opératif allié, its weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.  
**Punishing:** If you retain any succès critiques, you can retain one of your fails as a succès normal instead of discarding it.

Up to 1D3 friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératifs can immediately perform a free Ruée action in an order of your choice.
This point tournant, each that does so cannot perform the Ruée action during their activation. You cannot use this ploy during the first point tournant.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if it or the opératif ennemi in that sequence contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, that opératif's weapons have the Balanced special rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this firefight ploy when you activate your first friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif during the point tournant, if it is more than 5" from other opératifs alliés.
The first time that opératif performs either the Tirer or Combattre action during that activation, its weapons have the relentless rule.
Note this ploy cannot come into effect more than once per activation (You cannot use it during both the Tirer and Combattre action in the same activation).  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dés d'attaque.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action. During that activation, that opératif can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif's activation.
Until the end of that activation, having an opératif ennemi within its portée de contrôle does not prevent that opératif allié from performing the Ramasser un Marqueur or mission actions.

Use this Firefight ploy when an opératif ennemi performs the Repli action. Before it moves, inflict 2D3 damage on that opératif for each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif within its portée de contrôle.

equipments.description:
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.
In addition, friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératifs are not affected by the X" Devastating X weapon rule (i.e, Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Once per point tournant, when Un opératif is shooting a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED opératif more than 3" from it, at the start of the Roll dés de défense step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the X of the piercing weapon rule by 1 (If any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

Once per point tournant, whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED WAY SEEKER or CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED SOUL WEAVER opératif is performing a PSYCHIC unique action (excluding Warp Fold),
you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, add 3" to its distance requirement. Note this has no effect on PSYCHIC weapons (e.g, the Devastating distance requirement of Lightning Strike).

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**  

Roll 1D3, if the result is higher than the number of current point tournant, you gain 1CP and cannot use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT for the rest of the battle.

description:
Grim, fatalistic and utterly uncompromising, the Death Korps of Krieg are famed for their endurance and ability to do
battle in the most horrific conditions. Death Korps kill teams are made up of veteran specialists who have seen more fighting that many Astra Militarum soldiers will experience in their entire lifetime.
composition:
A DEATH KORPS KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER opératif with the following:
  - Boltgun; bayonet  
  Or one option from each of the following:
  - Bolt pistol, plasma pistol or relic laspistol
  - Chainsword or power weapon
- 4 TROOPER opératifs*
- 9 DEATH KORPS opératifs selected from the following list:
  - BRUISER
  - CONFIDANT with one of the following options:
    - Boltgun or lasgun; bayonet
    - Bolt pistol or relic laspistol; chainsword    
  - GUNNER with bayonet and flamer
  - GUNNER with bayonet and grenade launcher
  - GUNNER with bayonet and meltagun
  - GUNNER with bayonet and plasma gun
  - MEDIC
  - SAPPER
  - SNIPER
  - SPOTTER
  - TROOPER
  - VETERAN
  - VOX-OPERATOR
  - ZEALOT

Other than TROOPER opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.  

*Up to four times, instead of taking one of these TROOPER opératifs, you can select one DEATH KORPS ploy to cost you 0CP for the battle.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, LEADER, WATCHMASTER

abilities.description: If this opératif doesn't issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, you can use the Inspirational Leadership firefight ploy for 0CP during this opératif's activation.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** and **SUPPORT**
 A friendly DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER opératif can issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER.
 Whenever it does, select one GUARDSMAN ORDER for all friendly DEATH KORPS opératifs within 6" of it to receive.
 Whenever a opératif allié receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, apply its rules until the end of the point tournant.
 opératifs cannot benefit from more than one GUARDSMAN ORDER at once; they only benefit from the most recent order they received during the point tournant.
 
 - **Take Aim!**  

 Ranged weapons of opératifs that received this order (excluding mortar barrage and remote detonator) have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
 - **Fix Bayonets!**  

 Melee weapons of opératifs that received this order have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
 - **Dig In!**  

 Whenever Un opératif is shooting a opératif allié that has received this order, if you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
 - **Move! Move! Move!**  

 Whenever Un opératif that's received this order is performing the Repositionner action, add 1" to its Move stat.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, BRUISER

abilities.description: Once per point tournant, when this opératif is fighting or retaliating, in the Resolve dés d'attaque step, you can ignore the damage inflicted on it from one succès normal.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, CONFIDANT

abilities.description:
Whenever this opératif is activated, if you have not used the Second in Command rule during the battle, you can select one other ready friendly DEATH KORPS opératif visible to and within 6" of it.
When this opératif is expended, activate that other opératif allié before your opponent activates (if that opératif is a TROOPER, ignore its Group activation rule).

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** and **SUPPORT**
 A friendly DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER opératif can issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER.
 Whenever it does, select one GUARDSMAN ORDER for all friendly DEATH KORPS opératifs within 6" of it to receive.
 Whenever a opératif allié receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, apply its rules until the end of the point tournant.
 opératifs cannot benefit from more than one GUARDSMAN ORDER at once; they only benefit from the most recent order they received during the point tournant.
 
 - **Take Aim!**  

 Ranged weapons of opératifs that received this order (excluding mortar barrage and remote detonator) have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
 - **Fix Bayonets!**  

 Melee weapons of opératifs that received this order have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
 - **Dig In!**  

 Whenever Un opératif is shooting a opératif allié that has received this order, if you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
 - **Move! Move! Move!**  

 Whenever Un opératif that's received this order is performing the Repositionner action, add 1" to its Move stat.

If a friendly WATCHMASTER opératif is hors de combat and removed from the zone de combat, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of the battle, this opératif can issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT (even though it is not a WATCHMASTER opératif).

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, GUNNER
DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, MEDIC

abilities.description:
The first time during each point tournant that another friendly DEATH KORPS opératif would be hors de combat while visible to and within 3" of this opératif, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that opératif is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi. If you do, that opératif allié isn't hors de combat, has 1 wound remaining, and cannot be hors de combat for the remainder of that action.After that action, that opératif allié can immediately perform a free Ruée action, but must end that move within this opératif's portée de contrôle. Subtract 1 from this and that opératif's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that opératif allié's activation, that activation ends.  
 You cannot use this rule if this opératif is hors de combat, or if it is a Tirer action and this opératif would be a primary or secondary target.

Select one friendly DEATH KORPS opératif within this opératif's portée de contrôle to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un opératif that the Medic! rule was used on during this point tournant.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SAPPER

abilities.description: This opératif is carrying your Mine marker. It can perform the Ramasser un Marqueur action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Placer un Marqueur action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Ruée action.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SNIPER
DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SPOTTER

abilities.description:
**SUPPORT**
Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the end of the point tournant, whenever a friendly HUNTER CLADE opératif within 3" of this opératif is shooting that opératif ennemi, you can use this effect. If you do:

- That opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TROOPER

abilities.description:
Whenever this opératif is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly DEATH KORPS TROOPER opératif (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two opératifs in succession with this rule).

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VETERAN

abilities.description: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on this opératif.
Whenever this opératif is activated, it can receive one GUARDSMAN ORDER.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VOX-OPERATOR

abilities.description:
Once per point tournant, when this opératif receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, it can relay that order.
Whenever an order is relayed, all friendly DEATH KORPS opératifs in the zone de combat receive that order, then subtract 1 from this opératif's APL stat until the end of its next activation.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly DEATH KORPS opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif. Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, ZEALOT

abilities.description: Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense.

**SUPPORT**
Whenever a friendly DEATH KORPS opératif is within 3" of this opératif, that opératif allié's weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

**Severe:** If you do not retain any succès critiques, you can change one of your succès normaux to a succès critique. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a succès critique (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.

ploys.description:
Friendly DEATH KORPS opératifs' melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Whenever a friendly DEATH KORPS opératif is fighting wholly within your territory, or whenever it's retaliating, its melee weapons also have the Severe weapon rule.  
 **Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a succès normal without rolling it.  
 **Severe:** If you do not retain any succès critiques, you can change one of your succès normaux to a succès critique. The Devastating and Piercing Crits weapon rules still take effect, but Punishing and Rending don't.

**SUPPORT**
Select one friendly DEATH KORPS opératif that is more than 3" from opératifs ennemis.
Each other friendly DEATH KORPS opératif within 5" of that opératif and not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis can immediately perform a free Ruée action in an order of your choice,
but each that does so must end that move closer to that opératif.
Note that a Comms Device from universal equipment only affects the second distance of this rule.  

You cannot use this ploy and the Chronometer faction equipment STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the same point tournant.

Friendly DEATH KORPS opératifs' ranged weapons have the Saturate and Accurate 1 weapon rules.  
**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain sauvegardes de couverture.  
**Accurate x:** You can retain up to x dés d'attaque as succès normaux without rolling them.
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly DEATH KORPS opératif, if you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, improve that opératif allié's Save stat by 1.

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dés d'attaque for a friendly DEATH KORPS opératif, if it is shooting an opératif ennemi that has been shot by another friendly DEATH KORPS opératif during this point tournant. You can re-roll any of your dés d'attaque.

Use this firefight ploy when a ready friendly DEATH KORPS opératif is hors de combat, if it is not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis. Before it is removed from the zone de combat, it can immediately perform one free action. Unless otherwise specified, the opératif would be injured for this. Note that that opératif allié is injured for the duration of that action.

**SUPPORT**
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER or DEATH KORPS CONFIDANT opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.
It issues a GUARDSMAN ORDER.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly DEATH KORPS opératif is activated and given an Engage order.
It receives every GUARDSMAN ORDER. This takes precedence over the normal rule that opératifs cannot benefit from more than one GUARDSMAN ORDER at once.

equipments.description:
Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first or second point tournant.
Each friendly DEATH KORPS opératif wholly within your territory can immediately perform a free Ruée action in an order of your choice, but each that does so must end that move closer to an opponent's drop zone or zone de combat edge.  

You cannot use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT and the Regroup strategy ploy during the same point tournant.

Whenever a friendly DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER or friendly DEATH KORPS CONFIDANT opératif issues a GUARDSMAN ORDER, you can use this rule.
If you do, instead of each friendly DEATH KORPS opératif within 6" of it receiving that order, you can select one friendly DEATH KORPS opératif to receive that order.

Friendly DEATH KORPS opératifs have the following melee weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Hand Axe|3|4+|3/4|

Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Place your Gas marker in the zone de combat; it cannot be placed underneath Vantage terrain.
Whenever Un opératif is within 3" of that marker, subtract 1 from its APL stat. In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.
Note that Un opératif's APL stat is only changed while it is within 3" of that marker. If it moves more than 3" from that marker, its APL stat is no longer changed by this rule.

description:
Deathwatch kill teams combat the xenos foes of the Imperium with adaptive expertise and specialist weaponry.  

They wield some of Humanity's most highly advanced weapons alongside more esoteric equipment. Besides their superhuman strength and speed, the Deathwatch bring to the battlefield their hatred of the xenos in all its forms.
composition:
A DEATHWATCH Killteam is composed of 5 DEATHWATCH opératifs selected from the following list:
- WATCH SERGEANT
- AEGIS
- BLADEMASTER
- BOMBARD
- BREACHER
- DEMOLISHER
- DISRUPTOR
- GUNNER
- HEADTAKER
- HORDE-SLAYER
- MARKSMAN

Your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once, and can only include up to one GRAVIS opératif.

opTypes.keywords: DEATHWATCH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, LEADER, WATCH SERGEANT

abilities.description: You can select one additional equipment option.

You can do each of the following once per battle if this opératif is in the zone de combat:
- Use a DEATHWATCH strategy ploy for 0CP.
- Use a DEATHWATCH firefight ploy for 0CP.

Once per point tournant, when a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif is performing the Tirer action, in the Select Weapon step, you can use this rule. If you do, select one of the following weapon rules for that opératif's ranged weapons to have until the end of the action.
This rule cannot be used with explosive grenades (see universal equipment) or melta bombs.

- Blast 1" (you cannot select this if the weapon profile being used has the Torrent weapon rule)
- Devastating 1
- Lethal 5+
- Piercing 1
- Rending
- Saturate
- Severe

During each friendly DEATHWATCH opératif's activation, it can perform either two Tirer actions or two Combattre actions. abilities.description:
STRATEGIC GAMBIT.
Select one opératif ennemi visible to or within 6" of this opératif, then roll one D6. In the following Firefight phase, that opératif ennemi cannot be activated or perform actions until one of the following is true:
- Your opponent has activated a number of opératifs ennemis equal to the result of the D6.
- It's the last opératif ennemi to be activated.

The Advanced Auspex Scan firefight ploy costs you 0CP when both of the following are true:
- This opératif isn't dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.
- The target of that Tirer action (primary target, if relevant) is visible to this opératif.

Note that it doesn't have to be this opératif performing the Tirer action.

This opératif can perform the Vigilance action during its activation regardless of the zone de combat (see close quarters rules, kill team: Tomb World).
When using the close quarters rules, once per point tournant, after this opératif performs a free Tirer action on Vigilance, it can immediately perform a free Vigilance action.
However, if it does, it cannot Contre-attaquer (nor Vigilance twice if it's counteracted).

ploys.description: Select Conceal or Engage. Whenever a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif is shooting against or fighting against an opératif ennemi that has that order, that opératif allié's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif that's within your territory, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.
Whenever a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif is within your opponent's territory, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

ploys.ployName: And They Shall Know No Fear
ploys.description: You can ignore any changes to the stats of friendly DEATHWATCH opératifs from being injured (including their weapons' stats).

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dés d'attaque for a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif, if it's shooting against or fighting against Un opératif that doesn't have the CHAOS or IMPERIUM keyword. You can re-roll any of your dés d'attaque.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif is counteracting, before it performs any actions. You can change its order.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif performs the Tirer action. Until the end of the activation/contre-attaque, its ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule and opératifs ennemis cannot be obscured.
Use this firefight ploy when Un opératif is shooting a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif, in the Roll dés de défense step. You can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.

equipments.description: Once per point tournant, when a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif performs the Combattre action, at the start of the Roll dés d'attaque step, you can use this rule. If you do, inflict 1 damage on the opératif ennemi in that sequence.

Once per point tournant, during a friendly DEATHWATCH opératif's activation, you can use this rule. If you do, during that activation, that opératif can perform a mission action for 1 less AP.
Having an opératif ennemi within its portée de contrôle doesn't prevent that opératif allié from performing that mission action.
However, in such an instance, after it does so, you and your opponent roll-off. If your opponent wins, you cannot use this equipment for the rest of the battle.

Once during each friendly DEATHWATCH opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you can use this rule. If you do, select one of the following:
- That opératif allié regains up to D3 lost wounds.
- Remove any changes to that opératif allié's APL stat.
- Remove one of the following tokens that opératif allié has (before that token's activation effects are resolved, if relevant): Neutron Fragment, Poison, Terrorchem.

Once per battle, you can use the Special Issue Ammunition faction rule for up to two Tirer actions during one point tournant, but you must select different weapon rules for both uses. This takes precedence over the normal Special Issue Ammunition rules.

description: Elucia Vhane is a scion of a noble mercantile dynasty. Leaving behind her family's operations in the galactic north, Vhane led her Elucidian Starstriders to the Eastern Fringe. Alongside her esoteric crew, the bold Rogue Trader seeks to eclipse the rich history of her ancestors with her own rise to glory - or die trying.
composition:
Note that you do not select your opératifs from a list.
This kill team's opératifs are specified.

An ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDERS killteam is composed of every ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif in the following list:

- 1 ELUCIA VHANE
- 1 CANID
- 1 DEATH CULT EXECUTIONER
- 1 LECTRO-MAESTER
- 1 REJUVENAT ADEPT
- 1 VOIDMASTER
- 3 VOIDSMAN with lasgun and gun butt
- 1 VOIDSMAN with rotor cannon and gun butt

opTypes.keywords: ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER, IMPERIUM, LEADER, ELUCIA VHANE

abilities.description: Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, ignore the Piercing weapon rule.
Whenever this opératif performs the Combattre action, at the start of the Roll dés d'attaque step, you can use this rule. If you do, inflict 1 damage on the opératif ennemi in that sequence.

Whenever this opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that was already wounded when the action started, this opératif's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule; if the weapon already has that weapon rule, it has the Ceaseless weapon rule instead of Balanced.

Once per firefight phase, when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS or ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER ELUCIA VHANE opératif performs the Tirer action, you can select one of the following PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET ranged weapons for it to use. You cannot use each PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET more than once per battle.  
 
Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif is using a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET, determine sauvegardes de couverture differently. Instead, the target has a cover save if any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain. Note that while this can affect the target's cover save, you must still select a valid target as normal. In other words, the shot is guided by Un opératif in the zone de combat, but it comes from above.

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|---|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|Archeotech Beam|4|3+|6/7|
|Heavy (Repos), Piercing 2, Silent||||
|Plasma Battery|5|4+|5/6|
|Heavy (Repos), Lethal 5+, Piercing 1, Silent||||
|Macrocannon|5|4|4/5|
|Heavy (Repos), Piercing Crit 1, Saturate, Silent, Torrent 2"||||
|Guided Shell|5|4+|3/4|
|Heavy (Repos), Blast 2", Silent||||
|Cluster Bomb|5|4+|2/3|
|Heavy (Repos), Blast 3", Silent||||

The first time this opératif incapacitates an opératif ennemi during the battle, you can either gain 1 additional CP or use an additional WARRANT OF TRADE rule
(up to four uses per battle, instead of three). Note that you still cannot use the same WARRANT OF TRADE rule more than once per battle.

Up to three times per battle, you can use a WARRANT OF TRADE rule (below). Each one specifies when it can be used, and you cannot use the same WARRANT OF TRADE rule more than once per battle.  
  

**Consideration**
- When: In the Select opératifs step, after revealing your equipment options.
- Effect: Select one additional equipment option. It cannot be an option you have previously selected.
  

**Coordinate**  

- When: At the end of the Select opératifs step.
Effect: You gain 1 additional CP.
  

**Coerce**
- When: At the start of the Set Up opératifs step.
- Effect: Select one of the following options:

- Your opponent must set up all of their equipment before you set up any.
- You can set up all of your equipment before your opponent sets up any.
- Your opponent must set up all of their opératifs before you set up any.

  


**Explore**  

- When: STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first point tournant.
- Effect: Perform a free Repositionner action with one friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif that's wholly within your drop zone. It must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.
  


**Bribe**  

- When: It's your turn to activate Un opératif.
- Effect: You can skip that activation.
  


**Seize**  

- When: In the Strategy phase, after rolling off to decide initiative.
- Effect: You can re-roll your dice.
  


**Adaptable Terms (Approved Ops only)**  

- When: At the end of the second point tournant.
- Effect: Select a new tac op or a new primary op. If you select a new tac op, any points scored from the previous tac op are discarded.

but you cannot perform any actions other than Tirer, and you must use a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET to do so.

Once per firefight phase, when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS or ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER ELUCIA VHANE opératif performs the Tirer action, you can select one of the following PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET ranged weapons for it to use. You cannot use each PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET more than once per battle.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif is shooting Un opératif within 6" of it, that opératif allié's ranged weapons (excluding PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET weapons) have the Balanced weapon rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif performs the Repositionner action during its activation, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1" to its Move stat until the end of that activation, but it must end that move closer to your opponent's drop zone and cannot use a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET during that activation.

Place your Claim marker in the zone de combat. Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi that's within 3" of that marker, that opératif allié's weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule. In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a succès normal without rolling it.

The first time an dés d'attaque inflicts damage on each friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif during the point tournant in the Resolve dés d'attaque step, you can halve that inflicted damage (rounding up, to a minimum of 2).

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dés d'attaque for a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif, if it's shooting an opératif ennemi that's been shot by another friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif during this point tournant. You can re-roll any of your dés d'attaque. You cannot use this ploy while shooting with a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET.
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS opératif's activation. Until the end of the activation, add 1 to its APL stat.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif is activated that's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis. That opératif allié regains up to D3+2 lost wounds. You cannot use this ploy for each opératif allié more than once per battle.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS opératif is activated. Select one other ready friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS opératif visible to and within 3" of that opératif.
When that first opératif allié is expended, you can activate that other opératif allié before your opponent activates.
When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

equipments.description: Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif that has a 5+ Save stat (excluding CANID), you can retain one of your dés de défense results of 4 as a succès normal.

Up to twice per point tournant, whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a laspistol or lasgun, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of the point tournant, add 1 to both Dmg stats of that weapon and it has the Hot and Piercing Crits 1 weapon rules. Note that relic laspistols are excluded from this rule.

Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER opératif is using a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET, if the target is within 6" of a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS opératif, the target cannot be obscured and that weapon has the Saturate weapon rule.
Once per battle, when selecting a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET, you can select one that has already been used during the battle. This takes precedence over the normal PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET rules.

description:
It is the responsibility of the Adeptus Arbites to enforce Imperial law. Exaction Squads are formed from the most
highly skilled and experienced Arbitrators. They are tasked with hunting down and securing the most heinous of
criminals, returning them alive to face the full extent of the Emperor's justice.
composition:
An EXACTION SQUAD KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 EXACTION SQUAD PROCTOR-EXACTANT opératif with one of the following options:
  - Combat shotgun; repression baton
  - Shotpistol; dominator maul & assault shield
- 10 EXACTION SQUAD opératifs selected from the following list:
  - CASTIGATOR
  - CHIRURGANT
  - LEASHMASTER
  - R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF
  - MALOCATOR
  - MARKSMAN
  - REVELATUM
  - SUBDUCTOR
  - VIGILANT
  - VOX-SIGNIFIER
  - GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Grenade launcher; repression baton
    - Heavy stubber; repression baton
    - Webber; repression baton
        

  

Other than GUNNER, SUBDUCTOR and VIGILANT opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to two GUNNER opératifs (each must have a different option) and up to four SUBDUCTOR opératifs.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is fighting or retaliating, if it hasn't moved more than its Move stat during the activation, or if it's a contre-attaque, its melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Whenever you're selecting a valid target for a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif, opératifs ennemis within 4" of it cannot be in cover (instead of 2").
While this can allow such opératifs to be targeted (assuming they're visible), it does not remove their cover save (if any), unless the friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is within 2" as normal.
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif that's within 2" of an objective marker or an opératif ennemi, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi within 6" of it, or whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD GUNNER opératif is shooting, that opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.
Select one opératif ennemi within its portée de contrôle. One other friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif can immediately perform a free Combattre action, but it can only Combattre against that opératif ennemi.

Use this firefight ploy when an opératif ennemi performs a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch). Alternatively, use it at the end of the Firefight phase and select one opératif ennemi that controls an objective marker.  
 In either case, the next time your opponent would activate that opératif ennemi, you can interrupt that activation and activate a ready friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif. If you do, during that activation, that opératif allié must Combattre against or Tirer against that opératif ennemi, and cannot do so against any other opératifs ennemis until it does (if this isn't possible, that opératif allié's activation is cancelled).  
 After completing that opératif allié's activation, continue that opératif ennemi's activation (if possible). You cannot use this firefight ploy again until that opératif ennemi is activated or hors de combat.

Use this firefight ploy after an opératif ennemi shoots against or fights against a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif within 6" of it, and that opératif allié isn't hors de combat as a result.
That opératif allié can immediately perform either a free Tirer or a free Combattre action, but other opératifs ennemis cannot be selected as a valid target or to Combattre against during that action
(note that secondary targets from the Blast weapon rule can still be targeted).

ploys.ployName: Long Arm Of The Emperor's Law
ploys.description: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a weapon with the Range x weapon rule (excluding frag or krak grenade). Until the end of that action, add 3" to x.

equipments.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi would perform the Repli action while dans la portée de contrôle of a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif, if no other opératifs ennemis are within that opératif allié's portée de contrôle,
you can use this rule.
If you do, roll two D6, or one D6 if that opératif ennemi has a higher Wounds stat than that opératif allié.
If any result is a 4+, that opératif ennemi cannot perform that action during that activation or contre-attaque (no AP are spent on it).

Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif within 2" of it, your opponent cannot re-roll their dés d'attaque results of 1.

Up to twice per point tournant, when a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a combat shotgun, executioner shotgun, scoped shotpistol or shotpistol, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one of the following weapon rules for that weapon to have until the end of that action:

- Saturate.
- Piercing 1, but only if the target has a Save stat of 3+ or better.
- Torrent 1", but you cannot select more than one secondary target.
You can ignore any changes to the APL stats of friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératifs, and they aren't affected by opératifs ennemis' Shock weapon rule.

description: Farstalker Kinbands operate as scouts for the Kroot species. They range far and wide throughout the galaxy, seeking new and valuable genetic material to return to their Shapers. Farstalker Kinbands contain expert trackers, hunters and guerrilla fighters who are capable of matching far more technologically advanced foes.
composition:
A FARSTALKER KINBAND killteam is composed of:

- 1 FARSTALKER KINBAND KILL-BROKER opératif with one of the following options:
  - Kroot rifle; ritual blade
  - Pulse weapon; ritual blade
- 11 FARSTALKER KINBAND opératifs selected from the following list:
  - BOW-HUNTER
  - COLD-BLOOD
  - CUT-SKIN
  - HOUND
  - LONG-SIGHT
  - PISTOLIER
  - STALKER
  - TRACKER
  - HEAVY GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Dvorgite skinner; blade
    - Londaxi tribalest; blade    
  - WARRIOR with one of the following options:
    - Kroot rifle; blade
    - Kroot scattergun; blade
        
Other than HOUND and WARRIOR opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to two HOUND opératifs.

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, LEADER, KROOT, KILL-BROKER

abilities.description: **STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select one opératif ennemi to be your mark for the point tournant. Whenever a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against your mark, that opératif allié's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule. Whenever your mark is hors de combat, you can select a new opératif ennemi to be your mark for the point tournant (and can continue to do so during this point tournant).

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératifs that are not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contre-attaquer, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif that's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activation alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that opératif allié's contre-attaque for this point tournant.

Whenever your mark is hors de combat, you can select one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif within 6" of this opératif. Until the end of the battle, that opératif's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule. Each opératif allié can only be selected for this rule once per battle.

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, KROOT, BOW-HUNTER

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

if that opératif ennemi is also injured, this opératif's weapons also have the Rending weapon rule.

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératifs that are not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contre-attaquer, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif that's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis instead.

The first time this opératif performs the Combattre action during each of its activations, if neither it nor the opératif ennemi in that sequence is hors de combat,
this opératif can immediately perform a free Combattre action afterwards, but it can only Combattre against that opératif ennemi (and only if it's still valid to Combattre against).
This takes precedence over action restrictions.
Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating, for each dés d'attaque your opponent discards as a fail, inflict 1 damage on the opératif ennemi in that sequence.

abilities.description: This opératif cannot perform any actions other than Charge, Ruée, Repli, Combattre, Gather, Vigilance, Repositionner, Ramasser un Marqueur and Placer un Marqueur. It cannot use any weapons that aren't on its datacard.

Whenever an opératif ennemi performs the Combattre action, if this opératif is a valid opératif to Combattre against, you can force them to select this opératif to Combattre against instead.
Whenever an opératif ennemi ends the Charge action dans la portée de contrôle of another friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif within 3" of this opératif, if this opératif isn't dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis,
this opératif can immediately perform a free Charge action, but must end that move dans la portée de contrôle of that opératif ennemi.

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératifs that are not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contre-attaquer, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif that's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activation alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that opératif allié's contre-attaque for this point tournant.

Perform a free Ruée or Repositionner action with this opératif. During that move, you can perform a free Ramasser un Marqueur or Placer un Marqueur action with this opératif (you can determine control during that action to do so),
and any remaining move distance it had from the Ruée or Repositionner action can be used after it does so.

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, KROOT, LONG-SIGHT

This still counts as you counteracting (so activation alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that opératif allié's contre-attaque for this point tournant.

Until the start of this opératif's next activation:

- The concealed and stationary profiles of its Kroot hunting rifle have the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.
- Whenever it's shooting with its Kroot hunting rifle, opératifs ennemis cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, KROOT, PISTOLIER

abilities.description:

Whenever it's your turn to Contre-attaquer, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif that's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activation alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that opératif allié's contre-attaque for this point tournant.

Once per point tournant, when an opératif ennemi is performing the Tirer action and this opératif is selected as the valid target (or if it will be a secondary target from the Blast weapon rule),
if this opératif is ready, you can interrupt that action to use this rule.
If you do, this opératif can immediately perform a free Tirer action with its dual Kroot pistols (focused) against that opératif ennemi (you can change its order to Engage to do so),
but that opératif ennemi must be a valid target.
Select up to two valid targets. Tirer with this weapon against both of them in an order of your choice (roll each sequence separately).

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, KROOT, STALKER

abilities.description:
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératifs that are not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contre-attaquer, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif that's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activation alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that opératif allié's contre-attaque for this point tournant.
This opératif can perform the Charge action while it has a Conceal order.

Perform a free Charge action with this opératif, but don't exceed its Move stat (i.e. don't add 2"). Then immediately perform a free Combattre action with this opératif.
The first time you strike during that action, you can immediately resolve another of your successes as a strike (before your opponent).  

This opératif cannot perform this action while it has an Engage order, while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if it isn't within 1" of Light or Heavy terrain.

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, KROOT, TRACKER

abilities.description:
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératifs that are not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contre-attaquer, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif that's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activation alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that opératif allié's contre-attaque for this point tournant.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif. Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

Remove your Pech'ra marker from the zone de combat (if any). Then place your Pech'ra marker visible to this opératif, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that's visible to this opératif.
Whenever a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi that has that marker within its portée de contrôle, that opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.  

At the start of this opératif's next activation or if it's removed from the zone de combat (whichever comes first), remove your Pech'ra marker from the zone de combat.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, KROOT, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératifs that are not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contre-attaquer, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif that's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activation alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that opératif allié's contre-attaque for this point tournant.

Once per point tournant, during a friendly WARRIOR opératif's activation, you can use the Meat, Piercing Shot or Toxin Shot rule (see faction equipment) for that opératif. Doing so doesn't count for its once per point tournant limit.

ploys.description: During each friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif's activation, you can ignore the first vertical distance of 2" they move during one climb up.
Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératifs' melee weapons (to a maximum of 5).

Whenever a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif is shooting during an activation in which it hasn't performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action, its ranged weapons have the Balanced and Severe weapon rules; if the weapon already has the Balanced weapon rule, it has the Ceaseless and Severe weapon rules instead. Note that opératif isn't restricted from performing those actions after shooting.  
**Severe:** If you do not retain any succès critiques, you can change one of your succès normaux to a succès critique. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a succès critique (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a succès critique instead. This isn't cumulative with improved sauvegardes de couverture from Vantage terrain.
  
**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain sauvegardes de couverture.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif's activation. Until the end of that activation, that opératif doesn't have to control a marker to perform the Ramasser un Marqueur or mission actions that usually require this (taking precedence over that action's conditions - it only needs to contest the marker).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action. During that activation, that opératif can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.

Use this firefight ploy during the Combattre action when a ready friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif that has Light or Heavy terrain within its portée de contrôle is selected to Combattre against.
In the Resolve dés d'attaque step of that sequence, you resolve the first dés d'attaque (i.e. defender instead of attacker).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif is hors de combat by an opératif ennemi.
Until the end of the battle, whenever another friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against that opératif ennemi, that other opératif allié's weapons have the Relentless weapon rule.
You cannot use this ploy again during the battle until that opératif ennemi is hors de combat.  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dés d'attaque.

equipments.description:
Once per point tournant, when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a Kroot rifle, Kroot scattergun or dual Kroot pistols (focused), you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Piercing 1 weapon rule.  
You cannot use the Piercing Shot and Toxin Shot rules during the same action.

Once per point tournant, when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a Kroot rifle, Kroot scattergun or dual Kroot pistols (focused), you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Lethal 5+ and Stun weapon rules.  
You cannot use the Piercing Shot and Toxin Shot rules during the same action.

Once per point tournant, when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif (excluding HOUND) is activated, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you can use this rule. If you do, that opératif allié regains D3+1 lost wounds.

Once per battle, during a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND opératif's activation (excluding HOUND), before or after it performs an action, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1 to that opératif allié's APL stat until the end of its activation.

description:
Of all the mutant Beastmen in thrall to the Dark Gods, Fellgor Ravagers believe themselves the greatest and most powerful.
They stalk space hulks, underhives and warp-tainted ruins, using their keen senses to track unsuspecting prey through the darkness before striking and butchering their foes with savage glee.
composition:
A FELLGOR RAVAGERS KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 FELLGOR RAVAGER IRONHORN opératif with one of the following options:
  - Corrupted pistol; corrupted chainsword
  - Plasma pistol; bludgeon
- 9 FELLGOR RAVAGER opératifs selected from the following list:
  - DEATHKNELL
  - FLUXBRAY
  - GNARLSCAR
  - GOREHORN
  - HERD-GOAD
  - MANGLER
  - SHAMAN
  - TOXHORN
  - VANDAL
  - WARRIOR with one of the following options:
    - Autopistol; bludgeon
    - Autopistol; cleaver

Other than WARRIOR opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, CHAOS, LEADER, IRONHORN

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** if this opératif doesn't have one of your Frenzy tokens. Select one friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif.
That selected opératif, and each other friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif visible to and within 2" of it, can immediately perform a free Ruée action in an order of your choice.

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif that does not have one of your Frenzy tokens would be hors de combat during the battle, it is not hors de combat and it gains one of your Frenzy tokens.
All remaining dés d'attaque are discarded (including yours if this opératif is fighting or retaliating).
If it has a Conceal order, change it to Engage.  

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif has one of your Frenzy tokens:

- It's only hors de combat as detailed below.
- It cannot have a Conceal order.
- It's injured.
- It cannot perform the Ramasser un Marqueur, unique (excluding Sweeping Blow, see VANDAL) or mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).
- For the purpose of determining control of markers, treat its APL stat as 1. This takes precedence over any stat changes.


A friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif that has one of your Frenzy tokens is hors de combat when one of the following is met:

- Its activation or contre-attaque ends.
- An opératif ennemi is fighting against or retaliating against it and your opponent strikes with a succès critique.
- An opératif ennemi is fighting against or retaliating against it and your opponent strikes it for a second time with a succès normal. Note this can be strikes from two different Combattre actions.
- An opératif ennemi is shooting it and Critical Dmg is inflicted on it.
- The battle ends (resolve this before any victory conditions that resolve at the end of the battle).


Your opponent treats a FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif as being hors de combat (instead of when it would be hors de combat normally) when it gains one of your Frenzy
tokens for the purposes of scoring VPs (e.g. kill op) and faction rules that require it to be hors de combat (e.g. HAND OF THE ARCHON Power From Pain, CHAOS CULT Mutation, etc.).
