ploys.description: Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif is activated, if its order is changed from Conceal to Engage, it's ambushing for that activation. Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif that's ambushing is fighting, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead. Note that Un opératif that has one of your Frenzy tokens cannot ambush.

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi that's been shot by another friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif during this point tournant, that first opératif allié's ranged weapons have the
Ceaseless weapon rule; if the opératif ennemi has been shot by more than one other friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif during this point tournant, that first opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Relentless weapon rule instead.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dés d'attaque.

Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting an expended friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif, if you cannot retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one of your dés de défense as a succès normal without rolling it.

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif is fighting or retaliating, after rolling your dés d'attaque, you can use this rule. If you do, you must re-roll all of your dés d'attaque (you cannot only re-roll some).
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif is fighting or retaliating and you strike with a succès critique. Inflict 1 additional damage with that strike.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif's activation, when it incapacitates an opératif ennemi within its portée de contrôle. Select one other ready
friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif that's visible to and within 3" of the hors de combat opératif ennemi. When that first opératif allié is expended, you can activate that
other opératif allié before your opponent activates. When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Use this firefight ploy after a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif performs the Combattre action, if it's no longer dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis. That opératif allié can
immediately perform a free Charge action (even if it's already performed the Charge action during that activation), but cannot move more than 3" during that action.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif is activated. Until the end of that opératif's activation, add 1" to its Move stat.

equipments.description: Once per battle, you can use the Animalistic Fury and Wild Rage firefight ploys for 0CP each.

Once per point tournant, when a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif is fighting or retaliating, you can use this rule.
If you do, inflict 1 damage on that opératif allié and re-roll one of your dés d'attaque. If the result is a fail, inflict 1 additional damage on that opératif allié.

Once per point tournant, when Un opératif is shooting a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératif, at the start of the Roll dés de défense step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.
You can ignore any changes to the Move stat of friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER opératifs from being injured.

description:
Corrupted by a gruesome techno-organic affliction, the Gellerpox Infected are nightmarish meldings of flesh,
machinery and rampant disease. Most of these hideous beings began as loyal servants of the God-Emperor. Those
origins are long gone, however, wiped away by supernatural sickness and a compulsion to spread their infection
across the stars.
composition:
Note that other than MUTOID VERMIN, you do not select your opératifs from a list.  

This kill team's opératifs are specified.  

A GELLERPOX INFECTED killteam is composed of every GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif in the following list:

- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED
- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED BLOATSPAWN
- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED FLESHSCREAMER
- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED LUMBERGHAST
- 4 GELLERPOX INFECTED GLITCHLING
- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTANT with frag grenade and heavy axe
- 2 GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTANT with frag grenade and improvised weapon

If you selected the Mutoid Vermin faction equipment:  

Specified number of GELLERPOX INFECTED opératifs selected from the following list:

- CURSEMITE
- EYESTINGER SWARM
- SLUDGE-GRUB

opTypes.keywords: GELLERPOX INFECTED, CHAOS, NIGHTMARE HULK, LEADER, VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED

abilities.description:
Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK opératifs cannot use Light terrain for cover.
While this can allow such opératifs to be targeted (assuming they're visible), it doesn't remove their cover save (if any).  

Friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK opératifs cannot perform unique actions.
You must spend 1 additional AP for friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK opératifs (excluding VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED) to perform the Ramasser un Marqueur and mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).

Whenever an dés d'attaque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK or GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTANT opératif, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one objective marker this opératif controls to gain one of your Techno-curse tokens.
It cannot be an objective marker dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.
Whenever that objective marker is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, that opératif is affected by your selected TECHNO-CURSE rule and an additional rule determined by your TECHNO-CURSE, as shown below.
You cannot use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT while this opératif is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

- Barrelwarp: No additional effect.
- Screaming Rustspikes: This TECHNO-CURSE inflicts 2 damage on that opératif ennemi (instead of 1).
- Viral Vox-static: Whenever that opératif ennemi is activated, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of its activation.

At the end of the Select opératifs step, select one TECHNO-CURSE for friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératifs to gain for the battle.
 Whenever an opératif ennemi is within your selected TECHNo_CURSE's infection range,
 that opératif ennemi is affected by the symptom of the selected TECHNO-CURSE. Each TECHNO-CURSE, its infection range, and its symptom is listed below:  

 Each TECHNO-CURSE is listed below:
 
 - 
 		**Barrelwarp**  

        Infection Range: Within 2" of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif (excluding MUTOID VERMIN), or within 3" of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED GLITCHLING opératif.   

        Symptom: Subtract 1 from the Atk stat of that opératif ennemi's ranged weapons.
 	
     - 
 		**Screaming Rustspikes**
		Infection Range: dans la portée de contrôle of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif (excluding MUTOID VERMIN).  

		Symptom: Whenever that opératif ennemi is fighting or retaliating against a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif, if your opponent discards any dés d'attaque as a fail, inflict 1 damage on that opératif ennemi.
 	
     - 
 		**Viral Vox-static**
		Infection Range: Within 3" of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif (excluding MUTOID VERMIN), or within 4" of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED GLITCHLING opératif.  

		Symptom: That opératif ennemi's APL stat cannot be added to (remove all positive APL stat changes it has).

options.description:
**Techno-Curse**  

Subtract 1 from the Atk stat of that opératif ennemi's ranged weapons.

**Techno-Curse**  

Whenever that opératif ennemi is fighting or retaliating against a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif, if your opponent discards any dés d'attaque as a fail, inflict 1 damage on that opératif ennemi.

**Techno-Curse**  

That opératif ennemi's APL stat cannot be added to (remove all positive APL stat changes it has).

Whenever an opératif ennemi would perform the Repli action while dans la portée de contrôle of this opératif, you can use this rule.

abilities.description: Whenever this opératif is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTOID VERMIN opératif (if able) before your opponent activates. When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two opératifs in succession with this rule).

MUTOID VERMIN opératifs cannot perform any actions other than Charge, Ruée, Repli, Combattre, Repositionner and Tirer, or use any weapons that aren't on their datacard.
They can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.  

MUTOID VERMIN opératifs cannot contest markers or areas of the zone de combat, and are ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when they are hors de combat, and when determining your starting number of opératifs).
They are also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require opératifs to 'escape', 'survive' or be hors de combat by opératifs ennemis (if they escape/survive/are hors de combat, determining how many opératifs must escape/survive/be hors de combat, etc.).  

opératifs can move through MUTOID VERMIN opératifs, and opératifs ennemis can move dans la portée de contrôle of them.
Having only MUTOID VERMIN opératifs within their portée de contrôle does not prevent opératifs ennemis from performing the Charge, Ruée and Repositionner action, and opératifs ennemis can leave MUTOID VERMIN opératifs' portée de contrôle when performing the Charge action.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif is fighting or retaliating, you can do one of the following:

- If you roll three or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a succès normal instead.
- If you roll three or more successes, you can discard one of your fails to retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.

Select one objective marker. Whenever a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif performs the Repositionner or Charge action during its activation, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1" to its Move stat until the end of that activation, but it must end that move within 2" of that objective marker.
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif (excluding MUTOID VERMIN) that has an Engage order, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.
Whenever a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK opératif is fighting, your opponent cannot retain results of 3 as successes.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK opératif's activation or contre-attaque, before or after it performs an action.
During that activation/contre-attaque:

- It can move through opératifs ennemis and dans la portée de contrôle of them.
- It can perform the Charge and Repositionner actions while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, and can leave that opératif's portée de contrôle to do so (but then normal requirements for that move apply).

Use this firefight ploy after a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK opératif performs the Combattre action, if it is not hors de combat.
It can immediately perform a free Combattre action (you do not have to select the same opératif ennemi to Combattre against). This takes precedence over action restrictions.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif (excluding MUTOID VERMIN) is hors de combat, before it is removed from the zone de combat. Inflict 1 damage (or D3 damage instead if that opératif allié is a NIGHTMARE HULK) on each opératif ennemi visible to and within 2" of that opératif allié.

Use this firefight ploy when an opératif ennemi is shooting a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif.
That opératif's ranged weapons have the Hot weapon rule until the end of that sequence; if the weapon already has that weapon rule, when your opponent rolls one D6 for that weapon rule,
you can add or subtract 1 from the result. Note that for the latter you can see the result of your opponent's roll for the Hot weapon rule before deciding to use this ploy.  

**Hot:** After using this weapon, roll 1D6. If the result is less than the weapon's HIT stat, inflict Damage on that opératif equal to the result multiplied by 2. If it is used multiple times in one action (e.g. Blast), roll only 1D6.

equipments.description: After revealing this equipment option, add two GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTOID VERMIN opératifs to your kill team for the battle.

After revealing this equipment option, roll 2D6: on a 7+, remove one of your opponent's selected equipment options; otherwise, that player removes one of their own selected equipment options.
They cannot select that equipment again during the game sequence (e.g. in the Scouting step of Approved Ops). You cannot select this equipment option after the Select opératifs step.

Once per battle, when you activate a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED opératif, you can select one additional TECHNO-CURSE for that opératif to gain until the end of the point tournant (it must be different from your existing TECHNO-CURSE). Note that if a rule refers to an opératif ennemi being affected by your selected TECHNO-CURSE rule (e.g. VULGRAR THIRCE-CURSED opératif''s Spread The Glorious Gifts rule), it is affected by your additional TECHNO-CURSE rule too.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK opératif that's more than 6" from it, you can retain one of your dés de défense results of 3 as a succès normal instead of discarding it.

description: Goremongers are among the most lucid and reliable of Khorne's troops, pumping a constant flow of combat stimms mixed with drops of their masters' blood into their systems while still retaining a modicum of cunning and level-headedness. The first thing they do is to cut off their own legs and graft on a new mechanical pair that brings them closer to the ideal physical form, armed with blood letting chainweapons and ritual daggers..
composition:
A GOREMONGER kill team is composed of:

- 1 GOREMONGER BLOOD HERALD
- 7 GOREMONGER opératifs selected from the following list:
  - ASPIRANT
  - BLOODTAKER
  - IMPALER
  - INCITER
  - SKULLCLAIMER
  - STALKER

Other than ASPIRANT opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: GOREMONGER, CHAOS, LEADER, BLOOD HERALD

abilities.description:
Each friendly GOREMONGER opératif has a GORE TANK that has three levels: full, half and empty.
They start the battle at half. Whenever a GORE TANK increases, it goes up one level; whenever it decreases, it goes down one level.
A GORE TANK cannot increase when it's already full, or decrease when it's already empty.  

Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER opératif incapacitates Un opératif within its portée de contrôle, or visible to and within 2" of it, you can increase its GORE TANK.  

Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER opératif uses a SANGUAVITAE rule, you must decrease its GORE TANK.
Once per battle, when an dés d'attaque inflicts Normal damage on this opératif, you can ignore that inflicted damage.
Once during each of this opératif's activations, if its GORE TANK is empty, you can increase its GORE TANK.
Each friendly GOREMONGER opératif cannot lose more than 8 wounds per Tirer action.

Each SANGUAVITAE rule specifies when it can be used, and you must decrease the opératif's GORE TANK to do so.  

You cannot use the same SANGUAVITAE rule more than once per activation or contre-attaque, and you cannot use more than two SANGUAVITAE rules per activation or contre-attaque.  

You cannot use Mania and Fury during the same activation.  
  

**Rejuvenate:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER opératif's activation or contre-attaque, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: That opératif regains D3+1 lost wounds.
  

**Mania:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: Until the start of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.
  

**Fury:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: That opératif can perform two Combattre actions during that activation, and the second one is free.
  

**Rake:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER opératif performs the Charge action during its activation.  

EFFECT: When that opératif finishes moving during that action, you can inflict D3 damage on one opératif ennemi within its portée de contrôle.
  

**Surge:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER opératif performs the Charge or Repositionner action.  

EFFECT: Until the end of that action, add 1" to that opératif's Move stat.
  

**Rage:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER opératif performs the Combattre action.  

EFFECT: Until the end of that action, add 1 to the Atk stat of that opératif's melee weapons.

Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER opératif uses a SANGUAVITAE rule, you must decrease its GORE TANK.

Once during each of this opératif's activations, when this opératif ends the Combattre action, if it's no longer dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you can use this rule. If you do, it can immediately perform a free Charge action (even if it's already performed the Charge action during that activation),
but it cannot move more than 2" during that action. Doing so doesn't prevent it from performing the Charge, Ruée or Repositionner action afterwards during that activation.
Each friendly GOREMONGER opératif cannot lose more than 8 wounds per Tirer action.

Each SANGUAVITAE rule specifies when it can be used, and you must decrease the opératif's GORE TANK to do so.  

You cannot use the same SANGUAVITAE rule more than once per activation or contre-attaque, and you cannot use more than two SANGUAVITAE rules per activation or contre-attaque.  

You cannot use Mania and Fury during the same activation.  
  

**Rejuvenate:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER opératif's activation or contre-attaque, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: That opératif regains D3+1 lost wounds.
  

**Mania:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: Until the start of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.
  

**Fury:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: That opératif can perform two Combattre actions during that activation, and the second one is free.
  

**Rake:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER opératif performs the Charge action during its activation.  

EFFECT: When that opératif finishes moving during that action, you can inflict D3 damage on one opératif ennemi within its portée de contrôle.
  

**Surge:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER opératif performs the Charge or Repositionner action.  

EFFECT: Until the end of that action, add 1" to that opératif's Move stat.
  

**Rage:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER opératif performs the Combattre action.  

EFFECT: Until the end of that action, add 1 to the Atk stat of that opératif's melee weapons.

ploys.description:
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly GOREMONGER opératif, if that opératif allié's GORE TANK is:

- Half, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.
- Full, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense.

Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER opératif's GORE TANK is:

- Half, its melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
- Full, its melee weapons have the Relentless weapon rule.
Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER opératif is fighting or retaliating, the first time your opponent strikes it during that sequence, halve the damage inflicted (rounding up and to a minimum of 2).
Select one friendly GOREMONGER opératif. If it has a Conceal order, change it to Engage. Then it can immediately perform a free Charge action, but cannot move more than 3" during that action.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly GOREMONGER opératif is hors de combat, before it's removed from the zone de combat. Inflict damage determined by that opératif allié's GORE TANK on one opératif ennemi within that opératif allié's portée de contrôle.
  
Inflict:

- D3 if empty.
- D3+1 if half.
- D3+2 if full.

Use this firefight ploy when you would Contre-attaquer. You can do so with one friendly GOREMONGER opératif that has a Conceal order, but you must change its order to Engage and it cannot perform any actions other than Charge, Tirer or Combattre during that contre-attaque.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly GOREMONGER opératif with an empty GORE TANK is activated or counteracts. Increase that opératif's GORE TANK.
At the end of that activation/contre-attaque, decrease its GORE TANK (you cannot use this decrease to use a SANGUAVITAE rule); if you cannot decrease its GORE TANK, inflict D3 damage on it.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly GOREMONGER opératif is fighting during an activation in which it performed the Charge action, at the end of the Roll dés d'attaque step.
Until the end of that sequence, that opératif's melee weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

equipments.description:
Before the battle, you can set up one of your Gory Totem markers wholly within your territory and more than 2" from other markers (excluding your Bloody Cadaver marker).
Whenever an opératif ennemi within 3" of your Gory Totem marker is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent cannot re-roll their dés d'attaque.

Before the battle, you can set up one of your Bloody Cadaver markers wholly within your territory and more than 2" from other markers (excluding your Gory Totem marker).
Friendly GOREMONGER opératifs can perform the Ramasser un Marqueur action on that marker. In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can increase the GORE TANK of one friendly GOREMONGER opératif that controls that marker, unless that opératif allié is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

Once per point tournant, when Un opératif is shooting a friendly GOREMONGER opératif, at the start of the Roll dés de défense step, you can use this rule. If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

Once per point tournant, when a friendly GOREMONGER opératif performs the Tirer action and you're selecting a ranged weapon, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, the following melee weapons are treated as ranged weapons with the Range 2" weapon rule: chainblade, chainglaive, great chainaxe (ignore its Brutal weapon rule), pickrippers.

description:
The Archons of the Drukhari Kabals are forever plotting to expand their sprawling criminal empires. Should their
schemes require a subtle touch, they may turn to Hand of the Archon kill teams. These bands of assassins, thieves,
torturers and worse wield an array of esoteric and macabre weapons to aid them in their diabolical missions.
composition:
A HAND OF THE ARCHON KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 HAND OF THE ARCHON ARCHSYBARITE opératif with one of the following options:
  - Blast pistol; venom blade
  - Splinter pistol; venom blade
  - Splinter pistol; agoniser
  - Splinter pistol; power weapon
  - Splinter rifle; array of blades
- 8 HAND OF THE ARCHON opératifs selected from the following list:
  - AGENT
  - CRIMSON DUELLIST
  - DISCIPLE OF YAELINDRA
  - ELIXICANT
  - FLAYER
  - GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Blaster; array of blades
    - Shredder; array of blades
  - HEAVY GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Dark lance; array of blades
    - Splinter cannon; array of blades
  - SKYSPLINTER ASSASSIN

Other than AGENT opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to two darklight weapons (blast pistol, blaster and dark lance are darklight weapons).

opTypes.keywords: HAND OF THE ARCHON, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, LEADER, ARCHSYBARITE

abilities.description: In the Gambit step of each Strategy phase, if you pass at the first opportunity, you gain 1CP. Ignore each STRATEGIC GAMBIT from the mission pack (if any) when determining this.

After a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif performs an action, it gains one of your Pain tokens if:

- An opératif ennemi was injured during that action, but was not hors de combat.
- An opératif ennemi was hors de combat during that action. If that opératif ennemi had a Wounds stat of 12 or more, that opératif allié gains two of your Pain tokens instead.

You can spend opératifs alliés' Pain tokens on the invigorations below when the "when" condition is met.
You cannot use more than one invigoration per activation or contre-attaque, except Stimulated Senses, which can be used in addition to other invigorations.  
  

**Dark Animus**

- When: During the opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.
- Effect: Until the start of the opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.

**Accelerated Rejuvenation**

- When: During the opératif's activation or contre-attaque, before or after it performs an action.
- Effect: The opératif regains D3+1 lost wounds.

**Vitalised Surge**

- When: After the opératif incapacitates an opératif ennemi and that opératif ennemi is removed from the zone de combat.
- Effect: The opératif can immediately perform a free Ruée action, even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing the Ruée action.

**Stimulated Senses**

- When: After rolling your attack or dés de défense for the opératif.
- Effect: any of your dice results of one result (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif is shooting with a splinter rifle during an activation in which it has not performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action,
that weapon has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that opératif isn't restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

- When: During the opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.
- Effect: Until the start of the opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.

**Accelerated Rejuvenation**

- When: During the opératif's activation or contre-attaque, before or after it performs an action.
- Effect: The opératif regains D3+1 lost wounds.

**Vitalised Surge**

- When: After the opératif incapacitates an opératif ennemi and that opératif ennemi is removed from the zone de combat.
- Effect: The opératif can immediately perform a free Ruée action, even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing the Ruée action.

**Stimulated Senses**

- When: After rolling your attack or dés de défense for the opératif.
- Effect: any of your dice results of one result (e.g. results of 2).

Select one opératif ennemi visible to and within 6" of this opératif. That opératif and each other opératif within 1" of it takes a poison test.  

For Un opératif to take a poison test, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that opératif has a Save stat of 4+ or worse:
on a 3+, inflict D3 damage on that opératif and it gains one of your Poison tokens (if it does not already have one). Whenever Un opératif that has one of your Poison tokens is activated, inflict D3 damage on it.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: HAND OF THE ARCHON, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, ELIXICANT

abilities.description:
At the end of the Select opératifs step, if this opératif is selected for deployment, select one of the following COMBAT DRUG rules for friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératifs to have for the battle:

- **Painbringer:** Whenever an dés d'attaque inflicts damage of 3 or more on this opératif, roll one D6: on a 6, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.
- **Adrenalight:** STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one opératif allié that has this COMBAT DRUG to gain one of your Pain tokens.
- **Hypex:** You can ignore any changes to this opératif's Move stat from being injured.

After a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif performs an action, it gains one of your Pain tokens if:

- An opératif ennemi was injured during that action, but was not hors de combat.
- An opératif ennemi was hors de combat during that action. If that opératif ennemi had a Wounds stat of 12 or more, that opératif allié gains two of your Pain tokens instead.

You can spend opératifs alliés' Pain tokens on the invigorations below when the "when" condition is met.
You cannot use more than one invigoration per activation or contre-attaque, except Stimulated Senses, which can be used in addition to other invigorations.

- When: During the opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action.
- Effect: Until the start of the opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.

**Accelerated Rejuvenation**

- When: During the opératif's activation or contre-attaque, before or after it performs an action.
- Effect: The opératif regains D3+1 lost wounds.

**Vitalised Surge**

- When: After the opératif incapacitates an opératif ennemi and that opératif ennemi is removed from the zone de combat.
- Effect: The opératif can immediately perform a free Ruée action, even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing the Ruée action.

**Stimulated Senses**

- When: After rolling your attack or dés de défense for the opératif.
- Effect: any of your dice results of one result (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif is shooting with a splinter rifle during an activation in which it has not performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action,
that weapon has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that opératif isn't restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

Select one friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif visible to and within 3" of this opératif, then select one of the following for that opératif allié:

- It regains 2D3 lost wounds.
- Select a different COMBAT DRUG rule for it to have for the battle (this replaces its previous one).

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

abilities.description: If this opératif does not perform the Mark unique action (see right) during its activation, it can perform two Tirer actions during its activation, but a razorwing must be selected for one (and only one) of those actions.

In the Select opératifs step, when you're selecting equipment, you can select one opératif ennemi or one other friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif (reveal your selection when you reveal equipment).  

Whenever attack or dés de défense are rolled for that opératif:

- If it's an opératif ennemi, your opponent must re-roll their dice results of 6.
- If it's a opératif allié, you can re-roll any of your dice results of 1.

After a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif performs an action, it gains one of your Pain tokens if:

- An opératif ennemi was injured during that action, but was not hors de combat.

Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the end of the point tournant, whenever this opératif is shooting that opératif ennemi you can use this effect. If you do:

- This opératif's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

ploys.description:
Friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératifs' melee weapons have the Rending weapon rule.  
**Rending:** If you retain any critical hits, retain 1 normal hit as a critical hit instead.

Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif that's more than 2" from opératifs ennemis, if Heavy or Light terrain is intervening,
or any part of that opératif allié's base is underneath Vantage terrain, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.

Whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif is activated, before you determine its order, you can select one opératif ennemi that opératif allié isn't a valid target for.
Until the end of that activation, the first time that opératif allié is shooting against or fighting against that opératif ennemi, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.

Whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif is shooting against or fighting against a wounded opératif ennemi, that opératif allié's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action. During that activation, that opératif can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.

Use this firefight ploy after an opponent uses a firefight ploy (excluding one that costs 0CP).
The next time they would use that ploy, they must spend 1 additional CP to do so (at which point this effect ends).
You cannot use this ploy again during the battle until its effect has ended.
Use this firefight ploy when it's your turn to activate a opératif allié. You can skip that activation.

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dés d'attaque for a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif, if it's shooting against or fighting against a wounded opératif ennemi. You can re-roll any of your dés d'attaque.

equipments.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi would perform the Repli action while dans la portée de contrôle of a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif, if no other opératifs ennemis are within that opératif allié's portée de contrôle,
you can use this rule.
If you do, roll two D6, or one D6 if that opératif ennemi has a higher Wounds stat than that opératif allié.
If any result is a 4+, that opératif ennemi cannot perform that action during that activation or contre-attaque (no AP are spent on it).
Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératifs' array of blades.

Up to twice per point tournant, whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif is fighting or retaliating and you're selecting a melee weapon, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that sequence, that opératif's melee weapon has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.

Up to twice per point tournant, whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a shardcarbine, splinter cannon, splinter pistol, splinter rifle or stinger pistol,
you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, add 1 to the Normal Dmg stat of that weapon.

description:
Highly adept warriors and explorers of wrecked voidships and abandoned space stations, Hearthkyn Salvagers are tasked with identifying valuable material and marking it for later retrieval.
Heavily armed and utterly resolute, Hearthkyn Salvager kill teams seize and defend such claims with the steadfast determination typical of the Kin.
composition:
A HEARTHKYN SALVAGERS KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 HEARTHKYN SALVAGER THEYN opératif with one option from each of the following:
  - Autoch-pattern bolt pistol, Autoch-pattern bolter, bolt revolver, EtaCarn plasma pistol, ion blaster or ion pistol
  - Concussion gauntlet or plasma weapon
- 9 HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératifs selected from the following list:
  - DOZR
  - FIELD MEDIC
  - GRENADIER
  - JUMP PACK WARRIOR
  - KINLYNK*
  - KOGNITAAR*
  - LOKATR*
  - LUGGER*
  - WARRIOR*
  - GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - EtaCarn plasma beamer; fists
    - HYLas auto rifle; fists
    - HYLas rotary cannon; fists
    - L7 missile launcher; fists
    - Magna rail rifle; fists

Other than GUNNER and WARRIOR opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to three GUNNER opératifs (each must have a different option).

*With one of the following options:

- Autoch-pattern bolter; fists
- Ion blaster; fists

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, LEADER, THEYN

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select one opératif ennemi, or up to two opératifs ennemis if three or more friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératifs are hors de combat.
Each of those opératifs ennemis gains one of your Grudge tokens.

Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.
Once per battle, when an dés d'attaque inflicts Normal Dmg on this opératif, you can ignore that inflicted damage

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, DOZR

abilities.description:
Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating:

- opératifs ennemis cannot assist.
- If it is hors de combat, you can strike the opératif ennemi in that sequence with one of your unresolved successes before it's removed from the zone de combat.
- Normal Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Select one opératif ennemi within this opératif's portée de contrôle.
You can move that opératif ennemi up to 3" to a location it can be placed.
Then inflict D3+1 damage on it (even if you don't move it); if the D3 result is a 3, also subtract 1 from that opératif ennemi's APL stat until the end of its next activation.
This opératif can then immediately perform a free Charge action (even if it's already performed the Charge action during that activation), but cannot move more than 3" during that action.  

This opératif cannot perform this action unless an opératif ennemi is within its portée de contrôle.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, MEDIC, FIELD MEDIC

abilities.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

The first time during each point tournant that another friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif would be removed from the zone de combat as hors de combat while visible to and within 3" of this opératif,
you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that opératif is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.
If you do, that opératif allié is not hors de combat and has 1 wound remaining.
That opératif allié can then immediately perform a free Ruée action, but must end that move within this opératif's portée de contrôle.
Subtract 1 from this and that opératif's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that opératif allié's activation, that activation ends.
You cannot use this rule if this opératif is hors de combat.

Select one friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif within this opératif's portée de contrôle to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un opératif that the Medic! rule was used on during this point tournant.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, GRENADIER

abilities.description:
This opératif can use frag, krak, smoke and stun grenades (see universal equipment).
Doing so doesn't count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other opératifs).
Whenever this opératif is using a frag or krak grenade, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1.

Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

- Place one of your Smoke Grenade markers within 6" of this opératif. It must be visible to this opératif, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that is visible to this opératif. The marker creates an area of smoke 1" horizontally and unlimited height vertically from (but not below) it. - While Un opératif is wholly within an area of smoke, it is obscured to opératifs more than 2" from it, and vice versa. In addition, whenever Un opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi wholly within an area of smoke, ignore the Piercing weapon rule unless they are within 2" of each other. - In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, roll one D3. Remove that Smoke Grenade marker after a number of activations equal to that D3 have been completed or at the end of the point tournant (whichever comes first). - Un opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if you have reached the total number of times your kill team can perform it.

Place one of your Utility Grenade markers within 6" of this opératif.
It must be visible to this opératif, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that's visible to this opératif.
Whenever Un opératif is within 3" of that Utility Grenade marker, its controlling player must spend 1 additional AP for that opératif to perform the Ramasser un Marqueur and mission actions.  

In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, roll one D3. Remove that Utility Grenade marker after a number of activations equal to the result have been completed, or at the end of the point tournant (whichever comes first).


This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, GUNNER

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, FLY, JUMP PACK WARRIOR

abilities.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Whenever this opératif performs an action in which it moves, it can FLY. If it does, don't move it.
Instead, remove it from the zone de combat and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat (or 3" if it was a Ruée) of its original location,
measuring the horizontal distance only (in a zone de combat that uses the close quarters rules, e.g. zone de combat: Gallowdark, this distance cannot be measured over or through Wall terrain,
and that opératif cannot be set up on the other side of an access point - in other words it cannot FLY through an open hatchway).
Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Charge action.
It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it's the Charge action, it cannot be set up dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, KINLYNK

abilities.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Select one opératif ennemi that's a valid target for this opératif and that doesn't have one of your System Jam tokens; it gains one.
Until the end of the battle, whenever an opératif ennemi has one of your System Jam tokens, it cannot be activated until each opératif ennemi without one is expended.
When an opératif ennemi that has one of your System Jam tokens is activated, remove that token.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif in the zone de combat. Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, KOGNITAAR

abilities.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**
Place either your Attack or Defence marker in the zone de combat. Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi
that is within 3" of your Attack marker, you can re-roll one of your dés d'attaque.
Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif that is within 3" of your Defence marker, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.
In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.

If your Attack or Defence marker is in the zone de combat, remove it.  

Place your Attack or Defence marker in the zone de combat.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, LOKATR

abilities.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Place your Pan Spectral Scan marker in the zone de combat.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi that's within 3" of that marker, that opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Accurate 1 and Saturate weapon rules.
When this opératif is next activated, is hors de combat or performs this action again (whichever comes first), remove that marker.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

**SUPPORT**
Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the end of the point tournant, whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif within 3" of this opératif is shooting that opératif ennemi you can use this effect.
If you do:

- That opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, LUGGER

abilities.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.
Once during each of this opératif's activations, it can perform a mission action for 1 less AP.
You can select one additional equipment option.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
Whenever an opératif ennemi incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, that opératif ennemi gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi,
for each of your Grudge tokens that opératif ennemi has, you can retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead (including any succès normaux already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against this opératif, if this opératif contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, in the Resolve dés d'attaque
step, you can subtract 1 from the damage inflicted on it from one success.

ploys.description:
Select one objective marker or one of your mission markers.

- Whenever determining control of that marker, treat the total APL stat of friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératifs that contest it as 1 higher if at least one friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif contests that marker.
Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
- Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is within 3" of that marker, add 1 to the Atk stat of its melee weapons (to a maximum of 4).
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi within 6" of it, improve the Hit stat of that opératif allié's ranged weapons by 1 (to a maximum of 3+).

Select one objective marker or one of your mission markers.
Whenever an opératif ennemi is within 3" of that marker, treat it as having one additional Grudge token.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, if you rolled one or less successes (including any re-rolls), you can retain one of your fails as a succès normal instead of discarding it.
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif's activation. Until the end of that activation, that opératif can perform either a free Tirer or a free Combattre action.

Use this firefight ploy when Un opératif is shooting a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, when you collect your dés de défense. Change the attacker's retained succès critiques to succès normaux
(any weapon rules they've already resolved aren't affected, e.g. Piercing Crits).

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dés d'attaque for a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif, if it's shooting against or fighting against an opératif ennemi that controls
an objective marker or one of your mission markers. You can re-roll any of your dés d'attaque.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is hors de combat. It can perform a free mission action before it's removed from the zone de combat.

equipments.description:
Friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératifs have the following melee weapon. Note that the FIELD MEDIC opératif already has this weapon but with better stats; in that instance, use the better version.

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Plasma Knife|3|4+|3/5|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Lethal 5+|

Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératif is climbing, treat the vertical distance as 1" less (to a minimum of 2").
Note this has no effect when using ladder equipment terrain, which treats the vertical distance as 1" (but would have an effect if the opératif then continued climbing another terrain feature).

Friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératifs can perform the Ramasser un Marqueur action for 1 less AP, and don't have to control the marker to do so (taking precedence over that action's conditions - they only need to contest the marker).
Once per battle, if friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER opératifs contest two or more objective markers, after rolling off to decide initiative, you can re-roll your dice.

description: The Hernkyn are those Kin who serve as the Leagues of Votann's explorers, scouts, prospectors and pioneers. To the Kin, any region of blank space upon their star charts is a mystery in need of solving. The desire to plumb the depths of the void, to discover its secrets and claim its riches is deeply ingrained in their psyche, as is the need to know what -- if any -- sources of peril might lurk amidst the shadows.
composition:
A HERNKYN YAEGIR killteam is composed of:

- 1 HERNKYN YAEGIR Theyn opératif
- 9 HERNKYN YAEGIR opératifs selected from the following list:
  - Bladekyn
  - Bombast
  - Gunner
  - Ironbreak
  - Riflekyn
  - Tracker
  - Warrior with one of the following options:
    - Bolt Revolver, plasma knife
    - Bolt Shotgun, Fists
Other than Warrior opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: HERNKYN YAEGIR, VOTANN, LEADER, THEYN

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** in the first point tournant.  

Each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Repositionner action. Each that does so must end that move wholly within 4" of your drop zone.

The first time this opératif would be hors de combat during the battle, it is not hors de combat, has 1 wound remaining and cannot be hors de combat for the remainder of the action.
All remaining dés d'attaque are discarded (including yours, if this opératif is fighting or retaliating).

In the Ready step of each Strategy Phase after the first, you gain Resourceful points determined by the number of friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératifs in the zone de combat that aren't dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.
At the end of each point tournant, discard your Resourceful points.

| **opératifs** | **Resourceful Points** |
|:---:|:---:|
|5+|2|
|1-4|1|

You can spend 1 of your Resourceful points during each activation of each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif to do one of the following:

- Before or after it performs an action, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1 to that opératif allié's APL stat until the end of its activation.
- When it's activated, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, it regains up to D3+1 lost wounds.
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase after the first, if this opératif is not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you gain 1 Resourceful point.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** in the first point tournant.  

Each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Repositionner action. Each that does so must end that move wholly within 4" of your drop zone.

Whenever one of your reverse-side down Minefield markers is both within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle and not within a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif's portée de contrôle, flip the marker over.
If it is blank, there is no effect.
If it is a Hy-Pex mine, inflict 3 Damage on that opératif ennemi and roll 1D6. If the result is less than that opératif ennemi's Save stat, inflict additional damage on it equal to the dice result.
If it is not hors de combat, end its action (if any), even if that action's effects are not fulfilled.
If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount of distance to do so. Regardless, that marker is not removed.

You have five Minefield markers for the battle. On the reverse side, three of them are Hy-Pex mines and two are blank. Set up all your Minefield markers as if they were one item of equipment. Each must be set up reverse-side down (their specifics are not revealed), more than 2" from other markers, access points, and Accessible terrain, and more than 6" from your opponent's drop zone and your other Minefield markers. Whenever this opératif is readied, if it is not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you can reset one of your flipped Minefield markers that is within its portée de contrôle (flip the marker back over again).

In the Ready step of each Strategy Phase after the first, you gain Resourceful points determined by the number of friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératifs in the zone de combat that aren't dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.
At the end of each point tournant, discard your Resourceful points.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a succès critique instead.

This is not cumulative with improved sauvegardes de couverture from vantage terrain.

Each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Repositionner action. Each that does so must end that move wholly within 4" of your drop zone.

Whenever this opératif is shooting an enemy within 6" of it:

- This opératif's weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif cannot be obscured.

In the Ready step of each Strategy Phase after the first, you gain Resourceful points determined by the number of friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératifs in the zone de combat that aren't dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.

Whenever this opératif is shooting against or fighting against an expended opératif within 6" of it, this opératif's weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: HERNKYN YAEGIR, VOTANN, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** in the first point tournant.  

Each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Repositionner action. Each that does so must end that move wholly within 4" of your drop zone.

Whenever you spend a Resourceful point for this opératif, the following takes precedence:

- If you add 1 to its APL stat, it lasts until the start of its next activation instead.
- If it regains lost wounds, it regains 4 instead.

In the Ready step of each Strategy Phase after the first, you gain Resourceful points determined by the number of friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératifs in the zone de combat that aren't dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis.
At the end of each point tournant, discard your Resourceful points.

| **opératifs** | **Resourceful Points** |
|:---:|:---:|
|5+2|
|1-4|1|

- Before or after it performs an action, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1 to that opératif allié's APL stat until the end of its activation.
- When it's activated, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, it regains up to D3+1 lost wounds.

ploys.description: Whenever a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif has a conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage Terrain) except being within 2".

The first time an dés d'attaque inflicts damage on each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif during the point tournant in the Resolve dés d'attaque step, you can halve that inflicted damage (rounding up, to a minimum of 2).

Whenever a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif is shooting, if it is in Cover from the target's perspective, its weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
Note that your opponent still determines the targeting lines for this (i.e, they decide on a which point of their opératif's base targeting lines are drawn from).  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this firefight ploy when an opératif ennemi is shooting a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif, when you collect your dés de défense.
Change the attacker's retained succès critiques to succès normaux (any weapon rules they have already resolved are not affected, e.g, Piercing crits).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif is activated.
Select one other ready friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif visible to and within 3" of that opératif.
When that first opératif allié is expended, you can activate that other opératif allié before your opponent activates.
Neither opératif can be a BOMBAST opératif if its Wroughtlock Negotiation STRATEGIC GAMBIT has been used this point tournant.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif is hors de combat.
Before that opératif is removed from the zone de combat, remove your Fallen Kin marker from the zone de combat (if any), then place it within that opératif's portée de contrôle.
That opératif is then hors de combat as normal.  

Whenever a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif within 3" of your Fallen Kin marker is shooting, fighting or retaliating, in the Roll dés d'attaque step,
you can retain one of your fails as a succès normal instead of discarding it, or retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.

Use this firefight ploy when an opératif ennemi ends a move dans la portée de contrôle of a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif. Select one other friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif visible to and within 6" of that opératif allié, but that is not itself dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis. The selected opératif can perform a Tirer action. During that action:  - It can target that opératif ennemi even though it is dans la portée de contrôle of a opératif allié. - Other opératifs ennemis cannot be selected as a valid target. - You cannot select a frag or krak grenade, or a weapon with the Blast or x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e, Devastating with a distance)

equipments.description:
Once per point tournant, when a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a bolt shotgun (short range), you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Blast 1" weapon rule.

Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.
In addition, friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératifs are not affected by the X" Devastating X weapon rule (i.e, Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératifs have the following melee weapon. Note that some opératifs already have this weapon but with better stats; in that instance use the better version, and that weapon has the Balanced weapon rule for the battle..

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Plasma Knife|3|4+|3/5|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Lethal 5+|

Up to twice per point tournant, whenever a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR opératif is performing the Tirer action and you selected a bolt shotgun (long range), you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1 and add 1 to both of its damage stats.

description:
Led by ambitious and devious Crypteks, Hierotek Circles employ Necron soldiery and unique Canoptek constructs
to further the rise of their own dynasties. They achieve this by learning of their lords' enemies and undermining the
power of these rivals through artifice, sabotage, theft and murder.
composition:
A HIEROTEK CIRCLE KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif selected from the following list:
  - CHRONOMANCER opératif with one of the following options:
    - Aeonstave
    - Entropic lance
  - PSYCHOMANCER
  - TECHNOMANCER
- 1 PLASMACYTE ACCELERATOR opératif
- 1 PLASMACYTE REANIMATOR opératif
- 5 HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératifs selected from the following list:
  - APPRENTEK
  - DEATHMARK
  - DESPOTEK with one of the following options:
    - Gauss blaster; bayonet
    - Tesla carbine; bayonet    
  - GUARDIAN with one of the following options:
    - Gauss blaster; bayonet
    - Tesla carbine; bayonet
        
Other than DEATHMARK and GUARDIAN opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: HIEROTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, LEADER, CRYPTEK, CHRONOMANCER

abilities.description: In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, after resolving all other rules in this step (e.g. Reanimation Protocols faction rule), each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif regains 1D3+1 lost wounds (roll separately for each).

The first time each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif is hors de combat, before it's removed from the zone de combat, place one of your Reanimation markers within its portée de contrôle.
Then remove it as hors de combat, also removing any tokens and rules effects it had (e.g. CHRONOMANCER opératif's Chronometron action, Poison tokens, APL stat changes, being implanted, etc.).  

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, select one of your Reanimation markers and roll one 1D6:
On a 1-2, leave that Reanimation marker in the zone de combat and repeat this process with a different one of your Reanimation markers (if any);
on a 3+, Un opératif is REANIMATED.  

You can only select each of your Reanimation markers once per point tournant, and once you roll a 3+, you do not select any more for that point tournant.  

Whenever Un opératif is REANIMATED:

- Set up the opératif that Reanimation marker was placed for (it's no longer hors de combat). It must be placed within 3" of that Reanimation marker and not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis (if you cannot do so, treat the roll as 1-2 instead).
- It has 1 Wound remaining.
- It has an order of your choice and is ready.
- Remove that Reanimation marker.

For the purposes of the kill op, your opponent treats your starting number of HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératifs as 5 (in other words, their kill grade goes up whenever a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif is hors de combat, to a maximum kill grade of 5). REANIMATED opératifs don't retroactively change any other VPs your opponent has scored, e.g. from tac ops...

**SUPPORT**
Select one friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif.
Until the start of this opératif's next activation, until this opératif is hors de combat or until this action is performed again by a opératif allié (whichever comes first),
subtract 1 from the Atk stat of Un opératif's weapons whenever it is shooting that selected opératif.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

Place your Countertemporal Nanomine marker visible to this opératif, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that is visible to this opératif. Whenever an opératif ennemi is within 4" of your Countertemporal Nanomine marker, subtract 2" from its Move stat. When this opératif is next activated, is hors de combat or this action is performed again by a opératif allié (whichever comes first), remove that marker.  
 This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif (excluding APPRENTEK and CRYPTEK) visible to and within 6" of this opératif, or within 6" of a friendly DESPOTEK opératif that is visible to this opératif. That selected opératif can immediately perform a 1AP action for free (excluding Accelerate); it cannot move more than 2" during that action, perform an action it has already performed during this point tournant, or perform that action again during this point tournant.    This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or while counteracting.

**SUPPORT** Select one expended friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif visible to and within 5" of this opératif. Remove it from the zone de combat and set it back up visible to and within 5" of this opératif, measuring the horizontal distance only, in a location it can be placed. Each opératif allié can only be selected for this rule once per point tournant. Note that a Comms device from universal equipment only affects the first distance of this rule.    This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, during the first point tournant, or if a opératif allié has already performed this action during this point tournant.

opTypes.keywords: HIEROTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, LEADER, CRYPTEK, PSYCHOMANCER

abilities.description: In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, after resolving all other rules in this step (e.g. Reanimation Protocols faction rule), each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif regains 1D3+1 lost wounds (roll separately for each).

The first time each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif is hors de combat, before it's removed from the zone de combat, place one of your Reanimation markers within its portée de contrôle.
Then remove it as hors de combat, also removing any tokens and rules effects it had (e.g. CHRONOMANCER opératif's Chronometron action, Poison tokens, APL stat changes, being implanted, etc.).  

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, select one of your Reanimation markers and roll one 1D6:
On a 1-2, leave that Reanimation marker in the zone de combat and repeat this process with a different one of your Reanimation markers (if any);
on a 3+, Un opératif is REANIMATED.  

You can only select each of your Reanimation markers once per point tournant, and once you roll a 3+, you do not select any more for that point tournant.  

Whenever Un opératif is REANIMATED:

- Set up the opératif that Reanimation marker was placed for (it's no longer hors de combat). It must be placed within 3" of that Reanimation marker and not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis (if you cannot do so, treat the roll as 1-2 instead).
- It has 1 Wound remaining.
- It has an order of your choice and is ready.
- Remove that Reanimation marker.

As REANIMATED opératifs are no longer hors de combat, for the purposes of the kill op, this means your opponent's kill grade can go down during the battle (they lose VP accordingly).
However, it won't retroactively change any other VPs your opponent has scored, e.g. from tac ops.

Place your Despair marker visible to this opératif, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that is visible to this opératif.
When this opératif is next activated, is hors de combat or this action is performed again by a opératif allié (whichever comes first), remove that marker.  

Whenever an opératif ennemi is within 2" of your Despair marker, your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that opératif ennemi to perform the Ramasser un Marqueur and mission actions.
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of opératifs ennemis that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those opératifs ennemis is within 2" of your Despair marker.
Note this is not a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

Until the start of this opératif's next activation, until it is hors de combat or until this action is performed again by a opératif allié (whichever comes first), whenever an opératif ennemi within 4" of this opératif is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent cannot re-roll their dés d'attaque and cannot retain dés d'attaque results of less than 6 as succès critiques (e.g. as a results of the Lethal, Rending, or Severe weapon rules).  
 This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif (excluding APPRENTEK and CRYPTEK) visible to and within 6" of this opératif, or within 6" of a friendly DESPOTEK opératif that is visible to this opératif. That selected opératif can immediately perform a 1AP action for free (excluding Accelerate); it cannot move more than 2" during that action, perform an action it has already performed during this point tournant, or perform that action again during this point tournant.    This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or while counteracting.

Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif.
Until the start of this opératif's next activation, until it is hors de combat or until this action is performed again by a opératif allié (whichever comes first),
that selected opératif gains one of your Madness tokens.  

Whenever your opponent would activate an opératif ennemi that has one of your Madness tokens, you can roll one D6: if the result is equal to or higher than that opératif ennemi's APL,
they cannot activate it during this activation. If that opératif is successfully activated, or there are no other opératifs ennemis eligible to be activated, remove its Madness token.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: HIEROTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, LEADER, CRYPTEK, TECHNOMANCER

 Lethal 5+  
 Rending  
 Saturate  
 Severe  
Note that if you select a staff of light or arcane conduit, you only select the additional weapon rules for either the ranged or melee profile of that weapon.  
This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

**SUPPORT** Select one friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.  
 This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a opératif allié has already performed this action during this point tournant.

**SUPPORT**
Select one friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif.
Until the start of this opératif's next activation, until it is hors de combat or until this action is performed again by a opératif allié (whichever comes first),
whenever an dés d'attaque inflicts damage of 3 or more on that opératif, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif (excluding APPRENTEK and CRYPTEK) visible to and within 6" of this opératif, or within 6" of a friendly DESPOTEK opératif that is visible to this opératif. That selected opératif can immediately perform a 1AP action for free (excluding Accelerate); it cannot move more than 2" during that action, perform an action it has already performed during this point tournant, or perform that action again during this point tournant.    This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or while counteracting.

Whenever this opératif ends the Tirer action, the target gains one of your Deathmarked tokens if it was not hors de combat (the primary target, if relevant).
Whenever a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE DEATHMARK opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi that has one of your Deathmarked tokens, that opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek weapon rule.
