ploys.description:
Select one of the following:

- **SUPPORT** Each other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif visible to and within 6" of a friendly CRYPTEK opératif can immediately perform a free Ruée action in an order of your choice.
- **SUPPORT** Each other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif (excluding CRYPTEK) visible to and within 3" of a friendly APPRENTEK opératif can immediately perform a free Ruée action in an order of your choice.

Friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératifs' melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.
Whenever a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif is fighting during an activation in which it has not moved more than its Move stat, or whenever it is retaliating, its melee weapons have the Accurate 2 weapon rule instead.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a succès normal without rolling it.

Whenever a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif is shooting Un opératif within 8" of it, that opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
Note that when you are using the Magnify weapon rule, this opératif must still be within 8" of the target to use this rule (not the other opératif allié from which you're determining a valid target).  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif, if you cannot retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one of your dés de défense as a succès normal without rolling it.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE APPRENTEK or HIEROTEK CIRCLE CRYPTEK opératif performs a SUPPORT unique action.
Until the end of that action, for the purposes of selecting another opératif allié, ignore the distance requirement (only visibility is a requirement).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE DEATHMARK opératif's activation, if it has a Conceal order.
During that activation, that opératif can perform the Vigilance action (see close quarters rules, kill team Core Book) in any zone de combat and while it has a Conceal order,
but when you perform the free Combattre or Tirer action during the interruption, you must change its order to Engage.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE IMMORTAL opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a tesla carbine.
Until the end of that action, that weapon doesn't have the 2" from its Devastating weapon rule but has the Blast 2" weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy when determining control of a marker.
Select one of your Reanimation markers. Until the start of the next point tournant, whenever determining control of a marker, treat that Reanimation marker as a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif that has an APL stat of 1. For the purposes of the Martyrs tac op (Approved Ops 2025), this ploy has no effect.

equipments.description:
Once per point tournant, when a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE APPRENTEK or HIEROTEK CIRCLE CRYPTEK opératif is performing the Tirer action, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératif (excluding PLASMACYTE) that has an Engage order and is visible to that opératif allié.
Until the end of that action, that other opératif allié can be treated as l'opératif actif for the Magnify weapon rule.

Once per point tournant, when Un opératif is shooting a friendly CRYPTEK opératif, at the start of the Roll dés de défense step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence.
Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, when you gain CP, if a friendly CRYPTEK opératif is not hors de combat, is not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, and has not been REANIMATED this point tournant,
you can use this rule.
If you do, roll one D6: on a 1, you cannot use this rule for the rest of the battle; on a 4+, you gain 1CP.
Once you have gained 2CP from this rule, you cannot use it for the rest of the battle.

Once per point tournant, when an opératif ennemi ends the Charge action with friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE opératifs within its portée de contrôle, you can use this rule. If you do, inflict D3+1 damage on that opératif ennemi.

description:
To the techno-zealots of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the galaxy is a complex mechanism, its workings the creation of
their Machine God. They see the acquisition of knowledge as holy work, and task their cybernetically altered servants
with carrying it out, no matter the cost.
composition: A HUNTER CLADE killteam is composed of:  - 1 HUNTER CLADE opératif selected from the following list:   - SICARIAN INFILTRATOR PRINCEPS with one option from each of the following:     - Flechette blaster or stubcarbine     - Power weapon or taser goad   - SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER PRINCEPS   - SKITARII RANGER ALPHA with one of the following options:     - Galvanic rifle; gun butt       - Master-crafted radium pistol; power weapon       Or one option from each of the following:     - Arc pistol or phosphor blast pistol     - Arc maul or taser goad   - SKITARII VANGUARD ALPHA with one of the following options:     - Radium carbine; gun butt     - Master-crafted radium pistol; power weapon       Or one option from each of the following:     - Arc pistol or phosphor blast pistol     - Arc maul or taser goad - 9 HUNTER CLADE opératifs selected from the following list:   - SICARIAN INFILTRATOR WARRIOR* with one option from each of the following:     - Flechette blaster or stubcarbine     - Power weapon or taser goad   - SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER WARRIOR* with one of the following options:     - Chordclaw & transonic razor     - Transonic blades   - SKITARII RANGER DIKTAT   - SKITARII RANGER GUNNER* with gun butt and one of the following options:     - Arc rifle, plasma caliver or transuranic arquebus   - SKITARII RANGER SURVEYOR   - SKITARII RANGER WARRIOR   - SKITARII VANGUARD DIKTAT   - SKITARII VANGUARD GUNNER* with gun butt and one of the following options:     - Arc rifle, plasma caliver or transuranic arquebus       - SKITARII VANGUARD SURVEYOR   - SKITARII VANGUARD WARRIOR   *You cannot select more than 7 of these opératifs combined.    Other than GUNNER and WARRIOR opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to one DIKTAT opératif, up to one SURVEYOR opératif and up to five SICARIAN opératifs.    Your kill team can only include up to one arc rifle, up to one plasma caliver and up to one transuranic arquebus.

opTypes.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, LEADER, SICARIAN, RUSTSTALKER, PRINCEPS

abilities.description: Whenever a friendly HUNTER CLADE RUSTSTALKER opératif within 3" of this opératif is fighting, the first time you strike with a succès critique during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage.
You can use the Command Override firefight ploy for 0CP if the specified friendly HUNTER CLADE opératif is visible to this opératif.

*At the end of the Select opératifs step, select one DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE to be a Primary Mode for your kill team until the end of the battle (note that selecting a Primary Mode doesn't automatically give you the effects of that DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for the battle; you must still select it as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, as below).*  
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**  

Select a DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs to have until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.
Each DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE has both an Optimisation and a Deprecation rule. Both are in effect while your kill team has that DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE.  
  

**Protector Imperative**
- Optimisation: Friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs' ranged weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Hit stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs' melee weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**Conqueror Imperative**
- Optimisation: Friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs' melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Hit stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs' ranged weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**Bulwark Imperative**
- Optimisation: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on HUNTER CLADE opératifs alliés.
- Deprecation: Subtract 1" from the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs.

**Aggressor Imperative**
- Optimisation: Add 1" to the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Save stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs by 1.

**Neutral Imperative**
- Optimisation: None.
- Deprecation: None.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, if you
can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one additional cover save, or you
can retain one cover save as a succès critique instead. This isn't cumulative
with improved sauvegardes de couverture from Vantage terrain.

- Optimisation: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on HUNTER CLADE opératifs alliés.
- Deprecation: Subtract 1" from the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs.

**Aggressor Imperative**
- Optimisation: Add 1" to the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Save stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs by 1.

**Neutral Imperative**
- Optimisation: None.
- Deprecation: None.
Whenever an opératif ennemi is within 2" of friendly HUNTER CLADE VANGUARD opératifs, worsen the Hit stat of that opératif ennemi's weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

opTypes.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, SKITARII, VANGUARD, SURVEYOR

abilities.description:
*At the end of the Select opératifs step, select one DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE to be a Primary Mode for your kill team until the end of the battle (note that selecting a Primary Mode doesn't automatically give you the effects of that DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for the battle; you must still select it as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, as below).*  
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**  

Select a DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs to have until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.
Each DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE has both an Optimisation and a Deprecation rule. Both are in effect while your kill team has that DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE.  
  

**Protector Imperative**
- Optimisation: Friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs' ranged weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Hit stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs' melee weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**Conqueror Imperative**
- Optimisation: Friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs' melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Hit stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs' ranged weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**Bulwark Imperative**
- Optimisation: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on HUNTER CLADE opératifs alliés.
- Deprecation: Subtract 1" from the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs.

**Aggressor Imperative**
- Optimisation: Add 1" to the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Save stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE opératifs by 1.

**Neutral Imperative**
- Optimisation: None.
- Deprecation: None.
Whenever an opératif ennemi is within 2" of friendly HUNTER CLADE VANGUARD opératifs, worsen the Hit stat of that opératif ennemi's weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**SUPPORT**
Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the end of the point tournant, whenever a friendly HUNTER CLADE opératif within 3" of this opératif is shooting that opératif ennemi, you can use this effect. If you do:

- That opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

ploys.description: During each friendly HUNTER CLADE RUSTSTALKER opératif's activation, it can perform two Combattre actions, and one of them can be free.

Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly HUNTER CLADE VANGUARD opératif, if that opératif ennemi is under the effects of the Rad-Saturation rule
(see VANGUARD opératifs), subtract 1 from the Normal Dmg stat of its weapons (to a minimum of 3).
Whenever an opératif ennemi within 6" of a friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR opératif is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent cannot re-roll their dés d'attaque.

Each friendly HUNTER CLADE RANGER opératif that has a Conceal order and is more than 6" from opératifs ennemis can immediately perform a free Ruée action in an order of your choice. You cannot use this ploy during the first point tournant.

Use this firefight ploy when you activate a friendly HUNTER CLADE opératif. Select a DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for that opératif to have instead of its current one (if any) until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly HUNTER CLADE opératif's activation. Alternatively, use it when an opératif ennemi is shooting a friendly HUNTER CLADE opératif, at the end of the Roll dés d'attaque step. Until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, that opératif allié has an additional rule determined by its current DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE as follows: <uL> - **Protector:** This opératif's ranged weapons have the Severe weapon rule. - **Conqueror:** Whenever this opératif is fighting, after resolving your first dés d'attaque during that sequence, you can immediately resolve another (before your opponent). - **Bulwark: Improve this opératif's Save stat by 1. In addition, whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, you can collect and roll an additional dés de défense. If you use this ploy during a Tirer action, this opératif's Save stat is changed immediately (this takes precedence over the core rules). - **Aggressor: You can ignore the first vertical distance of 2" this opératif moves during one climb up. - **Neutral: None.  Note that you can use this ploy after rolling attack or dés de défense for this opératif, or before or after retaining or re-rolling those dice.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR opératif is activated. Alternatively, use this firefight ploy when a friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR opératif, or an opératif ennemi within 3" of that friendly
opératif, would perform the Ramasser un Marqueur or a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch). Until the start of that opératif allié's next activation, whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of enemy
opératifs that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those opératifs ennemis is within 3" of that opératif allié. Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this, and this can change control of a marker before performing the action.

equipments.description:
Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT in any point tournant after the first. Select one objective marker or your opponent's drop zone.
Roll one D6 separately for each opératif ennemi dans la portée de contrôle of that selected objective marker or within that drop zone, and subtract 1 if any part of that opératif ennemi's base is underneath Vantage terrain:  

on a 4+, subtract 1 from that opératif's APL stat until the end of its next activation;  

on a 6, also inflict D3 damage on it (roll separately for each).

Once per point tournant, when a friendly HUNTER CLADE opératif is activated, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, you can use this rule.
If you do, that opératif allié regains up to D3+2 lost wounds.

Once per point tournant, when Un opératif is shooting a friendly HUNTER CLADE opératif, at the start of the Roll dés de défense step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

Once per battle, you can use the Control Edict firefight ploy for 0CP, but instead of activating the selected opératifs alliés in succession, activate them at the same time.
Complete their activations action by action in any order.

description: Counted amongst the complement of many Navis Imperialis vessels, Navy Breachers are elite Voidsmen who are outfitted, trained and endlessly drilled in boarding actions and void-based combat. Wielding a wide array of cutting gear, boarding shields and close-range weapons, they are well-suited to deadly combat in close confines.
composition:
An IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHERS killteam is composed of:
- 1 IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER SERGEANT-AT-ARMS opératif with the following:  
  - Navis shotgun and Navis hatchet  
  Or one option from each of the following:  
  - Bolt pistol or heirloom autopistol
  - Chainsword or power weapon
- 10 IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs selected from the following list:
  - ARMSMAN
  - AXEJACK
  - C.A.T. UNIT
  - ENDURANT
  - GHEISTSKULL
  - GRENADIER
  - GUNNER with Navis las-volley and gun butt
  - GUNNER with meltagun and gun butt
  - GUNNER with plasma gun and gun butt
  - HATCHCUTTER
  - SURVEYOR
  - VOID-JAMMER

Other than ARMSMAN opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to two GUNNER opératifs.  

Your kill team can only include a GHEISTSKULL opératif if it also includes a VOID-JAMMER opératif, and it can only include a C.A.T. UNIT opératif if it also includes a SURVEYOR opératif.  

These opératifs count as half a selection each, meaning you can select both of them and it's treated as one selection in total.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, LEADER, NAVIS, SERGEANT-AT-ARMS

abilities.description:
Once per point tournant, when a ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif is activated, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif visible to and within 3" of that opératif.
When that first opératif allié is expended, you can activate that other opératif allié before your opponent activates. When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Whenever you would use the Attack Order or Defence Order strategy ploy, if this opératif is in the zone de combat, it costs you 0CP.
Once during each of this opératif's activations, before or after it performs an action, if your Attack Order or Defence Order marker is in the zone de combat (see relevant strategy ploy), you can either:

- Remove that marker and place it again.
- Change the selected ploy to the other (e.g. your Attack Order becomes a Defence Order).

You cannot do both, and you don't need to spend any CP to change the ploy.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, ARMSMAN

abilities.description:
Once per point tournant, when a ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif is activated, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif visible to and within 3" of that opératif.
When that first opératif allié is expended, you can activate that other opératif allié before your opponent activates. When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Whenever this opératif is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER ARMSMAN opératif (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two opératifs in succession with this rule).
Ignore this rule when you are using the Breach and Clear faction rule.

If you do, select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif visible to and within 3" of that opératif.
When that first opératif allié is expended, you can activate that other opératif allié before your opponent activates. When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

This opératif is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it's hors de combat, and when determining your starting number of opératifs). It's also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require opératifs to 'escape', 'survive' or be hors de combat by an opératif ennemi (if it escapes/survives/is hors de combat, determining how many opératifs must escape/survive/be hors de combat, etc.).

- This opératif cannot be activated or perform actions if it's dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER SURVEYOR opératif has been hors de combat. The point tournant can end even if this opératif is still ready. - This opératif cannot perform any actions other than Charge, Ruée, Repli, Repositionner and Spot. - It cannot retaliate, assist in a Combattre, climb or jump. - Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this opératif's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this. - Whenever this opératif has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2". - Whenever determining what's visible to this opératif, draw the line from any part of the miniature.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif is shooting that opératif ennemi, you can use this effect.
If you do:

- That opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

Place one of your Breach markers within this opératif's portée de contrôle as close as possible to a terrain feature dans la portée de contrôle of it.
Whenever Un opératif is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible terrain.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a terrain feature isn't within its portée de contrôle.

Select a closed hatchway (e.g. zone de combat: Gallowdark) within this opératif's portée de contrôle. 1 additional AP must be spent for other opératifs to perform the Operate Hatch action to open that hatchway.
This effect ends when that hatchway is opened. Note this opératif isn't affected by this effect.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if it isn't within 1" of a closed hatchway.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT opératif isn't in the zone de combat.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif (excluding C.A.T. UNIT or GHEISTSKULL) visible to and within 6" of this opératif, or visible to and within 6" of a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT opératif.
Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat. For the purposes of the Comms Device universal equipment, the opératif the distance is being determined from must control that marker.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

If you do, select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif visible to and within 3" of that opératif.
When that first opératif allié is expended, you can activate that other opératif allié before your opponent activates. When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Don't select a valid target. Instead, a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER GHEISTSKULL opératif is always the primary target and cannot be in cover or obscured. If that opératif isn't in the zone de combat, you cannot select this weapon.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one opératif ennemi visible to and within 8" of a friendly GHEISTSKULL opératif. Roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that opératif ennemi is a valid target for that friendly GHEISTSKULL opératif:
on a 3+, subtract 1 from that opératif ennemi's APL stat until the end of its next activation.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a friendly GHEISTSKULL opératif isn't in the zone de combat.

ploys.description:
Place your Attack Order marker in the zone de combat. Whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif within 3" of that marker is shooting, fighting or retaliating, its weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker. You cannot use this ploy and the Defence Order strategy ploy in the same Strategy phase.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Whenever Un opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif that is within your territory or that hasn't performed the Charge, Repli or Repositionner action during this point tournant, Normal and Critical Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on that opératif allié.

Whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif is fighting or shooting Un opératif within 3" of it, that opératif allié's weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.  
**Punishing:** If you retain any succès critiques, you can retain one of your fails as a succès normal instead of discarding it.

Place your Defence Order marker in the zone de combat. Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif that's within 3" of that marker, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker. You cannot use this ploy and the Attack Order strategy ploy in the same Strategy phase.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif performs the Tirer or Combattre action, and you select an opératif ennemi within 6" of it as a valid target or to Combattre against.
If it's the first opératif allié to perform either of those actions during this point tournant, its weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule for that action.
If it's the first opératif allié to be activated during this point tournant, its weapons also have the Severe weapon rule for that action.  
**Severe:** If you do not retain any succès critiques, you can change one of your succès normaux to a succès critique. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a succès critique (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a succès normal without rolling it.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif's activation, before or after it performs an action. That opératif can move through one Accessible terrain feature without it counting as an additional 1" and/or perform a free Operate Hatch action during its activation, and can do so during the Charge or Repli action. You cannot use this ploy if the access point has been welded shut (see HATCHCUTTER opératif) unless it's a friendly HATCHCUTTER opératif's activation.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif is activated. Select one objective marker.
Until the end of the battle or until you use this ploy again (whichever comes first), when determining control of that objective marker, treat that opératif allié's APL stat as 1 higher.
Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

Use this firefight ploy when you use the Breach and Clear faction rule. Select one of those friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs. Until the end of that opératif's activation, add 1 to its APL stat.

equipments.description: You can ignore any changes to the APL stats of friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs, and they aren't affected by opératifs ennemis' Shock weapon rule.

Up to three times per point tournant, whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif is performing the Tirer action and you select a navis shotgun (long range), you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1 and add 1 to both of its Dmg stats.
You can ignore any changes to the Move stat of friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs from being injured.
Once per point tournant, one friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif can perform the Operate Hatch action for 1 less AP.

description: The reach of the Inquisition extends across the vastness of the Imperium. Inquisitorial kill teams bring together agents from all strata of Imperial society, from elite soldiers to zealous priests. Together, these disparate elements combine their skills to deadly effect, enabling them to root out and destroy heretics, aliens and the servants of Chaos.
composition:
An INQUISITORIAL AGENTS killteam is composed of:

- 1 INQUISITORIAL AGENT INTERROGATOR opératif
- 1 INQUISITORIAL AGENT TOME-SKULL opératif
- 5 INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératifs selected from the following list:
  - AUTOSAVANT
  - QUESTKEEPER
  - DEATH WORLD VETERAN
  - ENLIGHTENER
  - HEXORCIST
  - MYSTIC
  - PENAL LEGIONNAIRE
  - PISTOLIER
  - GUN SERVITOR with one of the following options:
    - Heavy bolter; servo-claw
    - Multi-melta; servo-claw
    - Plasma cannon; servo-claw
- 5 INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératifs selected from the list above, or REQUISITIONED opératifs from one group in the Inquisitorial Requisition faction rule (you cannot select REQUISITIONED opératifs from different groups).
  
Your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once, unless you're not including any REQUISITIONED opératifs, in which case you can include up to two GUN SERVITOR opératifs, but each one must have different options.  

Your kill team (including any REQUISITIONED opératifs) cannot include more than one weapon with the Piercing 2 weapon rule, and cannot include more than three weapons with the Piercing X (excluding Piercing Crits X) weapon rule combined.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, LEADER, INTERROGATOR

abilities.description: STRATEGIC GAMBIT and/or when this opératif is activated. Select one of the following INQUISITORIAL TOME rules for this opératif to have, and one for a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT TOME-SKULL opératif to have (they can be the same, and ignore the rule you didn't select for each opératif):  - **Denunciation:** Whenever a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an opératif ennemi within 2" of opératifs with this rule, add 1 to the Atk stat of that opératif allié's weapons. - **Sanctification:** Whenever an opératif ennemi is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif within 2" of opératifs alliés with this rule, subtract 1 from the Atk stat of that opératif ennemi's weapons.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, TOME-SKULL

abilities.description: This opératif can have an INQUISITORIAL TOME rule (see INTERROGATOR). Note it keeps that rule even if that friendly INTERROGATOR opératif is removed from the zone de combat.

This opératif is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it's hors de combat, and when determining your starting number of opératifs). It's also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require opératifs to 'escape', 'survive' or be hors de combat (if it escapes/survives/is hors de combat by opératifs ennemis, determining how many opératifs must escape/survive/be hors de combat, etc.).

Whenever this opératif is expended, you must then activate a ready friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT INTERROGATOR opératif (if able) before your opponent activates.
The same is true in reverse (INTERROGATOR followed by TOME-SKULL). When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

- This opératif cannot perform any actions other than Charge, Ruée, Repli and Repositionner. - It cannot retaliate or assist in a Combattre. - Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this opératif's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this. - Whenever this opératif has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2".

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, AUTOSAVANT

abilities.description: Whenever this opératif contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, it always controls that marker. This takes precedence over all other rules.
This opératif cannot use any weapons that aren't on its datacard, or perform unique actions.
Each subsequent time your opponent uses each ploy during the battle (excluding Command Re-roll), you gain 1CP (to a maximum of 2CP per point tournant).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, QUESTKEEPER

abilities.description: If this opératif is hors de combat while fighting or retaliating, you can strike the opératif ennemi in that sequence with one of your unresolved successes before it's removed from the zone de combat.
Whenever an dés d'attaque inflicts damage of 3 or more on this opératif, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, DEATH WORLD VETERAN

abilities.description: This opératif can perform the Charge action while it has a Conceal order.
Once per point tournant, when this opératif is fighting or retaliating, in the Resolve dés d'attaque step, you can ignore the damage inflicted on it from one succès normal.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, ENLIGHTENER

abilities.description: Whenever an opératif ennemi is hors de combat within this opératif's portée de contrôle, you gain 1CP.

Whenever an opératif ennemi would perform the Repli action while dans la portée de contrôle of this opératif, you can use this rule.
If you do, roll one D6, subtracting 1 from the result if that opératif ennemi has a higher Wounds stat than this opératif, and adding 1 if that opératif ennemi is wounded:
on a 4+, that opératif ennemi cannot perform that action during that activation/contre-attaque (the AP spent on it isn't refunded).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, GUN SERVITOR

abilities.description: Whenever this opératif is activated, if it's visible to and within 3" of another friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif (excluding GUN SERVITOR) or vice versa, add 1 to this opératif's APL stat until the end of that activation.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, HEXORCIST

abilities.description: Whenever an opératif ennemi is visible to and within 6" of this opératif, your opponent cannot re-roll their attack or dés de défense for that opératif.

Select one opératif ennemi that is a valid target for this opératif and within 6" of it, then select one additional rule (including a unique action) that opératif ennemi has on its datacard (excluding a weapon rule).
Until the end of that opératif ennemi's next activation, it's treated as not having that additional rule.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, MYSTIC

abilities.description: Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this opératif's APL stat as 1 higher. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
This opératif cannot use any weapons that aren't on its datacard.

**PSYCHIC** Select one friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif within 6" of this opératif, then select one of the following effects to last until the start of this opératif's next activation, until it's hors de combat or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first):  - **Guidance:** PSYCHIC. Whenever the selected opératif is shooting, fighting or retaliating, in the Roll dés d'attaque step, you can retain one of your fails as a succès normal instead of discarding it, or retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead. - **Protection:** PSYCHIC. Whenever Un opératif is shooting the selected opératif, in the Roll dés de défense step, you can retain one of your fails as a succès normal instead of discarding it, or retain one of your succès normaux as a succès critique instead.  This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, PENAL LEGIONNAIRE

abilities.description: You can ignore any changes to this opératif's APL stat, and any changes to its stats from being injured. This opératif isn't affected by opératifs ennemis' Shock and Stun weapon rules.
Whenever this opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a wounded opératif ennemi, this opératif's weapons have the Relentless weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, PISTOLIER

abilities.description: You can ignore any changes to the Hit stat of this opératif's ranged weapons.

Perform two free Tirer actions with this opératif (this takes precedence over action restrictions). You must select a profile of its scoped plasma pistol for one action and its suppressed autopistol for the other (in any order).  
 This opératif cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or during an activation in which it performed the Tirer action (or vice versa).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ANATHEMA PSYKANA, SISTER OF SILENCE, PROSECUTOR

abilities.description:
PSYCHIC ranged weapons cannot inflict damage on this opératif. For the effects of PSYCHIC actions, this opératif cannot be selected and is never treated as being within those actions' required distances.
Whenever Un opératif is within 6" of this opératif:

- That opératif cannot perform PSYCHIC actions or use PSYCHIC additional rules.
- That opératif cannot use PSYCHIC ranged weapons.
- PSYCHIC melee weapons have no weapon rules and cannot have Dmg stats higher than 3/4.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ANATHEMA PSYKANA, SISTER OF SILENCE, VIGILATOR

abilities.description:
PSYCHIC ranged weapons cannot inflict damage on this opératif. For the effects of PSYCHIC actions, this opératif cannot be selected and is never treated as being within those actions' required distances.
Whenever Un opératif is within 6" of this opératif:

- That opératif cannot perform PSYCHIC actions or use PSYCHIC additional rules.
- That opératif cannot use PSYCHIC ranged weapons.
- PSYCHIC melee weapons have no weapon rules and cannot have Dmg stats higher than 3/4.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ANATHEMA PSYKANA, SISTER OF SILENCE, WITCHSEEKER

abilities.description:
PSYCHIC ranged weapons cannot inflict damage on this opératif. For the effects of PSYCHIC actions, this opératif cannot be selected and is never treated as being within those actions' required distances.
Whenever Un opératif is within 6" of this opératif:

- That opératif cannot perform PSYCHIC actions or use PSYCHIC additional rules.
- That opératif cannot use PSYCHIC ranged weapons.
- PSYCHIC melee weapons have no weapon rules and cannot have Dmg stats higher than 3/4.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, BRUISER

abilities.description: Once per point tournant, when this opératif is fighting or retaliating, in the Resolve dés d'attaque step, you can ignore the damage inflicted on it from one succès normal.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, CONFIDANT

abilities.description:
Whenever this opératif is activated, if you have not used the Second in Command rule during the battle, you can select one other ready friendly DEATH KORPS opératif visible to and within 6" of it.
When this opératif is expended, activate that other opératif allié before your opponent activates (if that opératif is a TROOPER, ignore its Group activation rule).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, GUNNER
INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, MEDIC

abilities.description:
The first time during each point tournant that another friendly DEATH KORPS opératif would be removed from the zone de combat as hors de combat while visible to and within 3" of this opératif, you can use this rule,
providing neither this nor that opératif is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.
If you do, that opératif allié isn't hors de combat and has 1 wound remaining.
That opératif allié can then immediately perform a free Ruée action, but must end that move within this opératif's portée de contrôle.
Subtract 1 from this and that opératif's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that opératif allié's activation, that activation ends.  

You cannot use this rule if this opératif is hors de combat.

Select one friendly DEATH KORPS opératif within this opératif's portée de contrôle to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un opératif that the Medic! rule was used on during this point tournant.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SAPPER

abilities.description:
Do not select a valid target. Instead, Tirer against each opératif within 2" of your Mine marker, unless Heavy terrain is wholly intervening between that opératif and that marker.
Each of those opératifs cannot be in cover or obscured. Roll each sequence separately in an order of your choice.
This weapon cannot be selected if your Mine marker isn't in the zone de combat. At the end of the action, remove your Mine marker from the zone de combat.

This opératif is carrying your Mine marker. It can perform the Ramasser un Marqueur action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Placer un Marqueur action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Ruée action.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SNIPER
INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TROOPER

abilities.description:
Whenever this opératif is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly DEATH KORPS TROOPER opératif (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two opératifs in succession with this rule).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VETERAN

abilities.description: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on this opératif.
Whenever this opératif is activated, it can receive one GUARDSMAN ORDER.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VOX-OPERATOR

abilities.description:
Once per point tournant, when this opératif receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, if it's not dans la portée de contrôle of opératifs ennemis, it can relay that order.
Whenever an order is relayed, all friendly DEATH KORPS opératifs in the zone de combat receive that order, then subtract 1 from this opératif's APL stat until the end of its next activation.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly DEATH KORPS opératif visible to and within 6" of this opératif. Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, ZEALOT

abilities.description: Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense.

**SUPPORT**
Whenever a friendly DEATH KORPS opératif is within 3" of this opératif, that opératif allié's weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TEMPESTUS SCION, COMMS

abilities.description:
SUPPORT. Select one other friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif in the zone de combat. Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This opératif can perform this action twice during its activation, but cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

If you do, that opératif allié isn't hors de combat, has 1 wound remaining, and cannot be hors de combat for the remainder of the action. After that action, that opératif allié can immediately perform a free Ruée action, but must end that move within this opératif's portée de contrôle. Subtract 1 from this and that opératif's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that opératif allié's activation, that activation ends. You cannot use this rule if this opératif is hors de combat or if it is a Tirer action and this opératif would be a primary or secondary target.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TEMPESTUS SCION, TROOPER

abilities.description:
You can do each of the following once per point tournant:

- One friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT TEMPESTUS SCION TROOPER opératif can perform the Smoke Grenade action.
- One friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT TEMPESTUS SCION TROOPER opératif can perform the Stun Grenade action.

The rules for these actions are found in universal equipment. Performing these actions using this rule doesn't count towards their action limits (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, CASTIGATOR

abilities.description: Whenever an opératif ennemi is dans la portée de contrôle of this opératif, if no other opératifs ennemis are within this opératif's portée de contrôle, that opératif ennemi cannot perform the Repli action.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, LEASHMASTER

abilities.description:
STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first point tournant. Select one of the following attack patterns for a friendly EXACTION SQUAD R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF opératif to have for the battle:

- Aggressive: Its melee weapons have the Relentless weapon rule.
- Swift: Add 2" to its Move stat.
- Defensive: Improve its Save stat by 1.

Select one friendly EXACTION SQUAD R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF opératif and change its attack pattern.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF

If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératifs within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle doesn't prevent that opératif ennemi from being selected.

Select one opératif ennemi within this opératif's portée de contrôle.
Until that opératif ennemi is no longer within this opératif's portée de contrôle, or until this opératif performs this action again (whichever comes first),
worsen the Hit stat of that opératif ennemi's weapons by 1 (this isn't cumulative with being injured);
in addition, that opératif ennemi cannot perform the Repli action.  

This opératif cannot perform this action unless an opératif ennemi is within its portée de contrôle.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, MALOCATOR

abilities.description: Once during each of this opératif's activations, it can perform the Ramasser un Marqueur, Placer un Marqueur, Veriscant or a mission action for 1 less AP.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératifs within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle doesn't prevent that opératif ennemi from being selected.

Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the start of this opératif's next activation, until it's hors de combat or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first),
whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against that opératif ennemi, that opératif allié's weapons have the Severe weapon rule;
if the weapon already has that weapon rule, it has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, MARKSMAN

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératifs within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle doesn't prevent that opératif ennemi from being selected.

Until the start of this opératif's next activation:

- The concealed and stationary profiles of its executioner shotgun have the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.
- Whenever it's shooting with its executioner shotgun, opératifs ennemis cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, REVELATUM

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** in the first point tournant.
If this opératif is wholly within your drop zone, it can immediately perform a free Repositionner action.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératifs within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle doesn't prevent that opératif ennemi from being selected.

**SUPPORT**
Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the end of the point tournant, whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif within 3" of this opératif is shooting that opératif ennemi,
you can use this effect. If you do:

- That opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, SUBDUCTOR

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.

Whenever this opératif is using this weapon:

- Each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).
- If this opératif is retaliating, you resolve the first dés d'attaque (i.e. defender instead of attacker).
You can ignore any changes to the Hit stat of this opératif's melee weapons.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, VIGILANT

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD opératif is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.

This opératif can perform the Tirer action (excluding Vigilance) while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, but only if it hasn't performed the Charge action during the activation,
or if it's a contre-attaque. Note this opératif isn't restricted from performing the Charge action after performing the Tirer action.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, VOX-SIGNIFIER

**SUPPORT**

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, ARMSMAN

abilities.description:
Whenever this opératif is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER ARMSMAN opératif (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other opératif is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two opératifs in succession with this rule).
Ignore this rule when you are using the Breach and Clear faction rule.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, AXEJACK

abilities.description: Whenever an dés d'attaque inflicts damage of 3 or more on this opératif during a point tournant in which it performed the Charge action, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, C.A.T. UNIT

abilities.description:
This opératif is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it's hors de combat, and when determining your starting number of opératifs).
It's also ignored for victory conditions that require opératifs to 'escape', 'survive' or be hors de combat (if it escapes/survives/is hors de combat, determining how many opératifs must escape/survive/be hors de combat, etc.).

- This opératif cannot be activated or perform actions if it's dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER SURVEYOR opératif has been hors de combat. The point tournant can end even if this opératif is still ready.
- This opératif cannot perform any actions other than Charge, Ruée, Repli, Repositionner and Spot.
- It cannot retaliate, assist in a Combattre, climb or jump.
- Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this opératif's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
- Whenever this opératif has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Vantage terrain).
- Whenever determining what's visible to this opératif, draw the line from any part of the miniature.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one opératif ennemi visible to this opératif. Until the end of the point tournant, until that opératif ennemi is no longer visible to this opératif or until this opératif performs this action again (whichever comes first),
whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif is shooting that opératif ennemi, you can use this effect.
If you do:

- That opératif allié's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, ENDURANT

abilities.description:
Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, they cannot select another friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif whose base is touching this opératif's if this opératif has an Engage order and is intervening.
This rule has no effect if more than one other opératif allié's base is touching this opératif's.
This opératif can perform the Repli action for 1 less AP.
Whenever this opératif is fighting or retaliating with this weapon, each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.

- Whenever this opératif has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Vantage terrain).

This opératif can only perform this action once per battle, and cannot perform it during the first point tournant.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, GRENADIER

abilities.description:
This opératif can use frag, krak and stun grenades (see universal equipment). Doing so doesn't count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other opératifs).
Whenever this opératif is using a frag or krak grenade, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

abilities.description:
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Place one of your Breach markers within this opératif's portée de contrôle as close as possible to a terrain feature dans la portée de contrôle of it.
Whenever Un opératif is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible terrain.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a terrain feature isn't within its portée de contrôle.

Select a closed hatchway (e.g. zone de combat: Gallowdark) within this opératif's portée de contrôle. 1 additional AP must be spent for other opératifs to perform the Operate Hatch action to open that hatchway.
This effect ends when that hatchway is opened. Note this opératif isn't affected by this effect.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if it isn't within 1" of a closed hatchway.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, SURVEYOR

abilities.description:
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT opératif. That opératif can immediately perform one free action, but it cannot move more than 3" during that action.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT opératif isn't in the zone de combat.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif (excluding C.A.T. UNIT or GHEISTSKULL) visible to and within 6" of this opératif, or visible to and within 6" of a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT opératif.
Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat. For the purposes of the Comms Device universal equipment, the opératif the distance is being determined from must control that marker.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, VOID-JAMMER

abilities.description: Don't select a valid target. Instead, a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER GHEISTSKULL opératif is always the primary target and cannot be in cover or obscured. If that opératif isn't in the zone de combat, you cannot select this weapon.

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératif, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dés de défense, or up to two of your dés de défense if that opératif allié is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER opératifs aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one opératif ennemi visible to and within 8" of a friendly GHEISTSKULL opératif. Roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that opératif ennemi is a valid target for that friendly GHEISTSKULL opératif:
on a 3+, subtract 1 from that opératif ennemi's APL stat until the end of its next activation.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi, or if a friendly GHEISTSKULL opératif isn't in the zone de combat.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, MEDIC, COMBAT MEDIC

abilities.description:
The first time during each point tournant that another friendly KASRKIN opératif would be removed from the zone de combat as hors de combat while visible to and within 3" of this opératif,
you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that opératif is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.
If you do, that opératif allié isn't hors de combat and has 1 wound remaining. That opératif allié can then immediately perform a free Ruée action, but must end that move within this opératif's portée de contrôle.
Subtract 1 from this and that opératif's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that opératif allié's activation, that activation ends.  

You cannot use this rule if this opératif is hors de combat.

Select one friendly KASRKIN opératif within this opératif's portée de contrôle to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un opératif that the Medic! rule was used on during this point tournant.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, DEMO-TROOPER

abilities.description:
This opératif is carrying your Melta Mine marker.
It can perform the Ramasser un Marqueur action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Placer un Marqueur action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Ruée action.
That marker cannot be placed within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle (if this opératif is hors de combat while carrying that marker and that marker cannot be placed, it's removed with this opératif).

The first time your Melta Mine marker is within another opératif's portée de contrôle, remove that marker and inflict 2D6+3 damage on that opératif;
if it is not hors de combat, end its action (if any), even if that action's effects are not fulfilled.
If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount to do so.
Note that this opératif is ignored for these effects (i.e. it cannot set it off or take damage from that marker).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, GUNNER
INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, RECON-TROOPER

abilities.description:
Until the start of this opératif's next activation or until it is hors de combat (whichever comes first),
whenever a friendly KASRKIN opératif is shooting an opératif ennemi within 8" of this opératif, that opératif ennemi cannot be obscured.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SHARPSHOOTER

abilities.description:
Whenever Un opératif is shooting this opératif:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any sauvegardes de couverture, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a succès critique instead.]
This is not cumulative with improved sauvegardes de couverture from Vantage terrain.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TROOPER

abilities.description:
You can do each of the following once per point tournant:

- One friendly KASRKIN TROOPER opératif can perform the Smoke Grenade action.
- One friendly KASRKIN TROOPER opératif can perform the Stun Grenade action.

The rules for these actions are found in universal equipment. Performing these actions using this rule does not count towards their action limits (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VOX-TROOPER

abilities.description:
Select one other friendly KASRKIN opératif. Until the end of that opératif's next activation, add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3 after all APL stat changes have been totalled).


This opératif can perform this action twice during its activation, but cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

ploys.description:
Select one opératif ennemi and roll one D3. In the Firefight phase of this point tournant, that opératif ennemi cannot be activated or perform actions until it is the last opératif ennemi to be activated,
or your opponent has activated a number of opératifs ennemis equal to the result of the D3 (whichever comes first).
This ploy costs you 1 additional CP for each previous time you've used it during the battle (e.g. 1CP the first time you would use it, 2CP the second time, etc.).

Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif that's within 3" of an objective marker, you can re-roll one of your dés de défense.
If that opératif allié contests that marker, you can re-roll any of your dés de défense results of one result instead (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever you're selecting a valid target for a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif, opératifs ennemis within 4" of it cannot be in cover (instead of 2").
While this can allow such opératifs to be targeted (assuming they're visible), it doesn't remove their cover save (if any), unless the friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif is within 2" as normal.

Select one opératif ennemi to be your quarry for the point tournant. Whenever a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against your quarry,
that opératif allié's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule. Whenever your quarry is hors de combat, you can select a new opératif ennemi to be your quarry (and can continue to do so during this point tournant).  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Use this firefight ploy during the battle, when an opponent uses a strategy or firefight ploy (excluding Command Re-roll or one that costs 0CP).
Their ploy isn't used, the CP spent on it is refunded and they cannot use that ploy again during this point tournant. This ploy cannot be used to stop the same ploy more than once per battle.

Use this firefight ploy when an opératif ennemi visible to and within 3" of a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif, or visible to and within 6" of a friendly MYSTIC opératif, performs the Ramasser un Marqueur or a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch).
Your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that opératif ennemi to perform that action (if they cannot or choose not to, the AP spent on it is refunded).

Use this firefight ploy when an opératif ennemi within 2" of a ready friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif performs an action in which it moves.
After it moves, that friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif can either perform a free Repositionner action, but must end that move within 2" of that opératif ennemi, or a free Charge action, but must end that move dans la portée de contrôle of that opératif ennemi.
If neither is possible, that opératif allié cannot perform those actions, this ploy isn't used and the CP spent on it is refunded.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif is activated. Until the end of that opératif's activation, you can ignore any changes to its stats (including its weapons' stats).

equipments.description:
Once per battle, when a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif is activated, if you've used the Quarry strategy ploy during this point tournant, you can use this rule.
If you do, you can select a new opératif ennemi to be your quarry until the end of the point tournant.
Whenever Un opératif is shooting a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif (excluding TOME-SKULL) that has a 5+ Save stat, you can retain one of your dés de défense results of 4 as a succès normal.

Friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératifs have the following melee weapon. Whenever a friendly SISTER OF SILENCE opératif is using it, add 1 to its Atk stat. 

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Combat Dagger|3|4+|3/4|
Once per battle, one friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT opératif can perform a mission action for 1 less AP.

description:
Amongst Cadia's most elite warriors, the Kasrkin are trained from birth in the art of war.
Clad in carapace armour and bearing a wide range of specialist wargear, they are the special forces of the Cadian regiments, tasked with completing nigh impossible missions in the defence and furtherance of the Imperial cause.
composition:
A KASRKIN KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 KASRKIN SERGEANT opératif with one of the following options:
  - Bolt pistol; power weapon
  - Hot-shot lasgun; gun butt
  - Hot-shot laspistol; power weapon
  - Plasma pistol; chainsword
- 9 KASRKIN opératifs selected from the following list:
  - COMBAT MEDIC
  - DEMO-TROOPER
  - GUNNER with flamer and gun butt*
  - GUNNER with grenade launcher and gun butt*
  - GUNNER with hot-shot volley gun and gun butt*
  - GUNNER with meltagun and gun butt*
  - GUNNER with plasma gun and gun butt*
  - Reconnaissance-TROOPER
  - SHARPSHOOTER*
  - TROOPER
  - VOX-TROOPER

Other than TROOPER opératifs, your kill team can only include each opératif on this list once.  

*You cannot select more than four of these opératifs combined.  

Some KASRKIN rules refer to a 'hot-shot weapon'. This is a ranged weapon that includes 'hot-shot' in its name, e.g. hot-shot lasgun, all profiles of a hot-shot marksman rifle, etc.

opTypes.keywords: KASRKIN, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, LEADER, SERGEANT

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select a SKILL AT ARMS for friendly KASRKIN opératifs to have until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.

- **Light 'Em Up**  
 Whenever a friendly KASRKIN opératif is shooting , its ranged weapons have the Severe weapon rule if any of the following are true for the target:

- It's ready.
- It's not in cover.
- It's being scanned (see Reconnaissance-TROOPER).


- **Strike Fast**  
 Whenever a friendly KASRKIN opératif is performing the Repositionner action, add 1" to its Move stat.
- **Ice In Your Veins**  
 Whenever a friendly KASRKIN opératif is fighting or retaliating, or Un opératif is shooting it, the first time an attack die inflicts Normal Dmg of 3 or more on this opératif during that sequence, that dice inflicts 1 less damage on it.
- **For Cadia!**  
 Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly KASRKIN opératifs' melee weapons (to a maximum of 4). Whenever a friendly KASRKIN opératif is fighting, the first time you strike during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage.

Select one friendly KASRKIN opératif, then select one SKILL AT ARMS for that opératif to have until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase. This can be in addition to any SKILL AT ARMS it already has, but they cannot be the same.  

Alternatively, instead of resolving the above effect, if your Clearance Sweep marker is in the zone de combat, you can remove it and place it again.  

This opératif cannot perform this action while dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi.

opTypes.keywords: KASRKIN, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, MEDIC, COMBAT MEDIC

abilities.description:
The first time during each point tournant that another friendly KASRKIN opératif would be hors de combat while visible to and within 3" of this opératif, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that opératif is dans la portée de contrôle of an opératif ennemi. If you do, that opératif allié isn't hors de combat, has 1 wound remaining, and cannot be hors de combat for the remainder of that action. After that action, that opératif allié can immediately perform a free Ruée action, but must end that move within this opératif's portée de contrôle. Subtract 1 from this and that opératif's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that opératif allié's activation, that activation ends.  
 You cannot use this rule if this opératif is hors de combat, or if it is a Tirer action and this opératif would be a primary or secondary target.

opTypes.keywords: KASRKIN, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, DEMO-TROOPER

abilities.description:
This opératif is carrying your Melta Mine marker.
It can perform the Ramasser un Marqueur action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Placer un Marqueur action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Ruée action.
That marker cannot be placed within an opératif ennemi's portée de contrôle (if this opératif is hors de combat while carrying that marker and that marker cannot be placed, it's removed with this opératif).

The first time your Melta Mine marker is within another opératif's portée de contrôle, remove that marker and inflict 2D6+3 damage on that opératif;
if it is not hors de combat, end its action (if any), even if that action's effects are not fulfilled.
If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount to do so.
Note that this opératif is ignored for these effects (i.e. it cannot set it off or take damage from that marker).

You can do each of the following once per point tournant:

- One friendly KASRKIN TROOPER opératif can perform the Smoke Grenade action.
- One friendly KASRKIN TROOPER opératif can perform the Stun Grenade action.

The rules for these actions are found in universal equipment. Performing these actions using this rule does not count towards their action limits (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment).
